text: Kalo lagi pengen ke Bali dan tujuannya adalah Kuta, boleh masukkan Rhadana Kuta ini ke dalam wishlist. Lokasinya strategis dan harganya suangat terjangkau start from 200K doang. Cocok untuk yang mau berhemat ria selama di Bali bestie. Walaupun harganya terjangkau kamarnya pun tetep nyaman. Great Hotel!
title: Boutique Hotel Recommended in Kuta!

text:
Hotel nya unik,,tempat nya strategis untuk tinggal di daerah kuta dan kota.
Restoran nya sedikit kurang luas menurut saya dan makanan nya enak,,kolam renang nya kurang memuaskan 
Lampu untuk kolam renang sudah mati di saat malam,sedikit kecawa tapi room nya the best
title: Unique hotel

text: Suka dengan konsep kamarnya yang unik, karena setiap kamar temanya berbeda dan banyak spot juga buat foto - foto (jadi cocok buat yang narsis 😉). Lokasinya juga strategis, dekat kalau mau ke Kuta atau Seminyak. Staffnya ramah & pelayanannya juga baik.
title: Unique Room Hotel

text:
Secara keseluruhan hotel ini bagus. Ratenya wajar, tidak overpriced.
+ Mengakomodasi request tamu dg baik. 
+ Kamar bersih meskipun tidak terlalu besar. 
+ Staf resepsionis ramah.
+ Amenities cukup lengkap. 
+ Fasilitas cukup lengkap. 
- Kamarnya kurang kedap suara. Saat malam hari banyak tamu ribut di koridor dan suaranya terdengar sampai dalam kamar. Cukup mengganggu istirahat. 
- Fasilitas gym sulit dioperasikan. Setelah menduga-duga, ternyata ups belum di posisi on 😂. 

Overall, pengalaman yang menyenangkan kok menginap di hotel ini. 
Thank you.
title: 👍👍👍

text:
Mendapatkan informasi dari internet bahwa Rhadana adalah salah satu pilihan hotel halal di Bali, membuat kami tertarik mencobanya

Hotel tidak terlalu besar, tapi masih nyaman. Proses check in dan check out cepat.
Menu sarapan standar saja dan rasanya juga enak. Lokasi resto tidak terlalu besar. Untuk anda yang muslim, hotel ini menyajikan makanan halal saja, jadi jangan khawatir.

Sempat mencoba kolam renang, kualitas air lumayan baik dan bersih juga. Airnya tidk dingin, sesuai lah.

Akhirnya hotel halal ini cocok dan bisa jadi rekomendasi untuk anda yang muslim
title: Hotel Halal di Bali

text: Hotelnya bagus, dekornya minimalis dan nuansanya lucu2, berbeda2 tiap kamarnya.. ada kamar nuansa The Beatles, nuansa sepeda, nuansa army dan bahkan ada yang nuansa untuk honeymoon. Enak dan homie bangetttt..
title: Hotel Rhadana Kuta

text: Wahhh kmrn kesini suka banget sama kamarnya yang “The Beatles”, ruangannya lumayan gede sih, trus ternyata tiap kamar tuh themes ya beda2 jugaa looo.... trus deket lagi kemana2...dan yang paling penting harganya juga murah banget.... boleh banget nih buat kalian nginap kalau cari Hotel nyaman dan Murah daerah Kuta 😁👍🏼
title: Tempatnya nyaman

text: First time stay di Rhadana kuta saat pertama kali masuk kamar, melihat suasana kamar yang sungguh unik! Suka sekali walpaper kamar, makanan dan semuanya. Pelayanan ramah dengan harga yang terjangkau.❤️
title: Desain kamar yang menarik!

text:
Hotel yang menurut review sangat ramah terhadap muslim dikarenakan fasilitas sholat disediakan di kamar example: sajadah, sarung dan Al-Quran. Meskipun terletak di jalan Raya Kuta yang terkenal dengan macetnya di pagi atau sore hari hehe
Untuk sarapan lumayan enak mungkin perlu ditambah variasi nya.
Kamarnya bersih, nyaman, lampu nya juga tidak redup. Ada lukisan di kamar nya. good!
Kolam renang bagus, airnya jernih.
title: Hotel islami di Bali

text: Front desk yang ramah, hotel yang unik. Bagi yang muslim gak usah kuatir untuk beribadah, di kamar disesiakan alat sholat dan dilantai atas ada mushola. Poolnya keren berada dibelakang hotel. Dekat dengan pantai kuta
title: Cozy hotel

text: Sangat nyaman sekali, pelayanan hotel yang bagus dan perlengkapan sholat yang tersedia juga lengkap. Kamarnya juga bersih dan nyaman. Thank u for your good hospitality rhadana 👍🏻 gonna back again for my next trip
title: Hotel nyaman

text: Hotel Rhadana merupakan hotel syariah di Bali. Suasana di hotel cukup menyenangkan, adanya alat2 sholat seperti: sajadah, sarung dan mukena, petunjuk kiblat dan al quran sangat menyenangkan. Kalau dari sisi makanan saat sarapan, rasanya juga lumayan enak. Untuk kolam renang, cukup menyenangkan dengan desain yang menarik. Tips untuk mencari makan di sekitar hotel: banyak warung makanan halal di sekitar hotel. Jadi seharusnya tidak masalah untuk mencari makanan. Selain itu di dekat hotel ada RM Taliwang Bersaudara, makanannya enak.
title: Hotel syariah di Bali

text: Hotel yang bersih, nyaman, kolam renang bagus biarpun gak nyoba karna pulang ke hotel malam terus,staff ramah, yg istimewa adalah adanya peralatan sholat dan arah kiblat di kamar...satu lagi omeletnya enyaaak..
title: Nyaman

text: Seperti berbagai ulasan tentang hotel ini, keramahan kebersihan kenyamanan dan ketenangan benar benar kami rasakan selama 3 malam. Kamar kami selalu dalam bersih dan harum setelah kami pulang jalan-jalan. Jadi kerasan di sini dan kami pasti akan kembali.
title: We'll be back

text: Kebersihannya oke banget, namun shower toilet airnya kurang deras, handuk tidak di ganti dan tidak menyediakan extra bed. Overrall untuk kebersiha oke lah, terima kasih rhadana , terima kasih booking.com
title: Kebersihan oke
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Hotel yang nyaman,  kamarnya bersih,  kamar mandi bersih,  disediakan peralatan sholat di kamar,  makanan sertifikat halal. Omelet,  sosis dalam menu sarapan sesuai kebutuhan keluarga kecil kami. Kebetulan kami bawa anak usia 10 tahun, dia sangat menikmati kolam renang yang bersih dan jernih airnya.  Senang menginap disini.
title: Hotel yang Nyaman
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Tempat nyaman... Bersih... Dan pelayanan cukup memuaskan loh...dekat kemana kemana utk kepantai atau kemana pun,  mini market pun dekat ko... Sampa di saat pelayanan TIDY handuk bisa berubah jadi bebek wow... Its so cute guys...
title: Traveller
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Mungkin sebelumnya saya infokan kali Ini saya bukan review tentang hotel rhadana nya, tp restaurant yang terdapat di hotelnya cafe De dapoer ,, saya dan istri penasaran dengan restaurant ini apalagi sudah di recomend halal MUI sayangnya pas mau coba ayam goreng mamie signature dish nya nga ada, trus coba pesan nasi goreng kambing juga nga ada. Akhirnya kita pesan nasi soto ayam makan berdua mungkin lain kali bisa coba menu lainnya yang jelas halal. Untuk menginap saya sedang berencana utk liburan Nyepi ,, PS Musholla nya bagus serasa di Masjidil Haram :)
title: Santap siang di De dapoer cafe

text: Hotel yang Islami disediakan perlengkapan shalat dikamar, pelayanan ramah, parkir motor di basement bikin tenang, hotel & kamar overall bersih dan nyaman, anak-anak senang sekali dapat room disamping kolam renang, lokasi strategis dekat kemana-mana, hanya saja bisa chek-in  ke kamar jam 14.00, sedangkan jam 10.00 kami sudah di hotel, tapi kami ditawarkan penitipan barang, lain waktu kami ke Bali pasti menginap di hotel Rhadana.
title: Hotel Yang Bersih dan Nyaman

text:
Disambut Sepeda onthel jadul, hotel ini langsung menyergap saya dengan aroma kopi yg muncul dr sela2 interiornya. Kita merasa berada di dunia lain. Ornamen interior lobi sudah menunjukkan bahwa layanan Hotel ini berkelas dan terbaik diantara sejenisnya. 
Ke Bali tanpa ke sini, rasanya anda akan menyesal.
title: Ditangkap Aroma Kopi Alami Dunia Lain

text: saya menginap di hotel rhadana 2malam bersama pasangan.2malam sekitar 800an.puas dgn harga cm 800an 2malam dapat fasilitas sangan memuaskan..lokasinya g jauh dr pusat kota...bisa sewa motor jg tinggal tanya sama pak satpam....menu breakfast semua ok...toilet ok.ada hairdyer.sandal hotel..air panas jg ok.krn dr pengalaman saya.ada jg yg harga lbh mahal tp no hairdryer.air panas lambat.g ada sandal hotel.untuk room boy jg rapi bersihin kamar.
title: Good hotel..

text: Saya hanya berkesempatan menginap semalam di Hotel Rhadana Kuta dan sangat senang bisa menginap di hotel ini. Satu yg buat saya senang disamping keramahan para staff adalah hotel ini menyediakan seperangkat alat sholat dan al-quran disetiap kamarnya dan ini tentunya sangat membantu sekali untuk muslim traveller. Dengan Predikat HALAL MUI tentunya saya tidak terlalu pusing dengan sarapan yg diberikan dan rasanya sangat puas dibanding harga yg saya bayar. Sangat rekomendasi dan jika kembali saya pasti menginap di hotel ini lagi.
title: Cocok untuk Muslim Traveller

text: Kami menginap 3 hari 2 malam (17-19 september), hotel dengan fasilitas yang bagus (kolam renang, wifi, TV, kulkas), kamar tidur dan kamar mandi bersih (air panas tersedia), staf hotel yang ramah dan bersahabat. Makanan yang cocok untuk saya dan suami saya. Mitra Tour & Travel nya juga baik dan ramah ( Raya Kuta Transportasi , "Terima kasih bli wayan"). Kami puas menginap di sini ..: D
title: Good Hotel

text: Hotel syariah di Bali. Akses pinggir jalan. Staf yang friendly. Kamar unik dengan berbagai nuansa, dari Bob Marley sampai ke nuansa pesawat terbang. Kolam renang yang cukup bersih, semilir, enak untuk dipakai bersantai sekitar sore pukul 16.00an ke atas. Restoran dengan pernak-pernik jadul.
title: The Rhadana Kuta, Bali

photos.caption: Nuansa Tour de Singkarak (Event Balap sepeda tahunan di Sumbar)

text:
Hotel ini terletak di Jalan Kuta Raya which is means lokasinya strategis. Hotel ini sangat sesuai untuk wisatawan muslim karena mengantongi sertifikat Halal MUI. Bagi wisatawan muslim, Anda tidak perlu ragu-ragu saat menyantap sarapan ataupun memesan makanan di hotel ini. Selain itu, hotel ini juga menyediakan sajadah, mukena, Al Quran, dan arah kiblat. Hotel ini juga saaangat bersih, airnya bagus, dan pelayanannya cepat dan ramah.
Kekurangan hotel ini mungkin dari segi kamar yang sempit dan restoran yang kurang luas. Laundry hotel juga termasuk agak mahal menurut saya.

Meskipun demikian, jika kembali ke Bali saya mungkin akan menginap lagi di hotel ini.
title: Hotel bersih dan Halal

text: Lokasi yang strategis di Kuta, staff ramah dan sangat membantu. Studio room bagus dan unik dengan tema yang berbeda tiap-tiap kamar, tapi kamar mandi agak kotor karena rayap. Rasa makanannya lumayan enak.
title: Akses jalan mudah

text: Hotel yg bersih dengan harga yang cocok di kantong. Cuma agak sempit. Kamar mandi tissue nya habis, pesan dua hari tinggal tapi tisu tdk di ganti. Di samping hotel jalan dikit ke kiri ada warung makan enak dan murah. Kolam renang nya juga bersih.
title: Flo

owner_response.text:
Dear flo e,

Terimakasih sudah memposting review di  Trip Advisor. Setelah kami double check satu per satu dengan record kami di lapangan. Tissue kamar mandi selalu di ganti pada saat habis dan kami yakin sekali tidak ada kamar yang tidak di lengkapin dan tidak ada kamar yang terlewatkan oleh Housekeeping team kami yang selalu juga di quality check oleh Supervisor dan di kontrol kembali oleh Manager on Duty tiap hari nya. Kami sangat terkejut membaca review anda dan perlu di ketahui semenjak The Rhadana Kuta Bali buka dan beroperasi, ini adalah review pertama kali yang menyebutkan tentang tissue yang tidak di ganti.

Sekali lagi terimakasih atas review yang di berikan yang kami tanggapin berdasarkan fakta dan record kami di lapangan.

Salam hangat,

Budiman Widjaja
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Baru masuk hotel d sambut dengan ramah oleh petugas,Interior yg unik, keren, pelayanannya top banget, petugasnya juga ramah2 banget dan ada mushalanya jadi buat traveller muslim nyaman banget dech....

Jadi pengin lagi menginap di rhadana hotel
title: Keren

text: Rhadana nama hotel nya.ramah dan sopan pelayanan nya.sangat gampang mencari lokasi nya.tidak begitu jauh dari pantai Kuta.dan juga dekat dengan Mall Galeria...Good Service..fasiltas nya juga ada kolam renang nya.yang sangat special di Rhadana Hotel bahwa menyediakan ruangan Mushallo untuk umat muslim dan bisa juga di pakai untuk acara acara pengajian.dengan beberapa kali Ustad Kondang dari Jakarta.sudah bermalam di sini..
title: Pengalaman

text:
Lokasi: Berada tepat di Jalan besar dan jauh dari pantai Kuta dan pusat keramaian sesuai yang kita lihat di Maps, adapun pemilihan lokasi yang jauh dari pantai ini karena memang pada hari 1 & 2 saya tidak berencana ke Pantai Kuta.

Room: Kamar yang kami pesan mereka menamakan "kamar business" dengan ukuran kamar yang minimalis alias kecil +/- 2 1/2 meter x 4 meter,tidak tersedia bath tub di kamar mandi namun perlengkapan mandi spt shower tersedia dengan baik. Hotel juga dilengkapi dengan Room WIFI dengan speed standard. Wifi ini juga dapat di access di public area. Untuk Sleep quality menurut saya pribadi kasurnya masih kurang nyaman walau sudah dilengkapi AC split yang dingin untuk masing2 kamar.

Sarapan Pagi: Free untuk 2 orang dan untuk anak dikenakan charge kalau tidak salah IDR 60ribu, menu yang di sajikan +/- 5 menu main course, selain ada buah segar, kopi dan susu. 

Fasilitas: Terdapat kolam renang, namun karena agenda jalan yang padat kami sekeluarga tidak mencoba fasilitas pool tersebut.

Kesimpulan: Lokasi hotel berada pada jalan utama namun jauh dari pantai dan pusat keramaian, kamarnya kecil namun bersih dengan menu makan pagi standard dan pelayanan yang friendly
title: Minimalis

text: Lokasi strategis, dr bandara ga nyampe 30menit, dket kmna2 aplg pantai kuta cm 15menit. Paling suka kamar ny bersih bgt, kamar mandi jg bersih, nyaman bgt dah berasa rumah kedua. Pelayanan ny okeh, ramah, cepat tanggap, dr resepsionis, housekeeping, kitchen sampe ke bag parkir. Sebrang hotel jg ada minimarket. Cari makan wkt mlem jg gampang tgl nyebrang, ad nasgor cm 10rb. Selama di bali jg qt sewa motor cm 60rb. Murmer kannn... Pkok ny ngnep di hotel ini recommended bgt.. Bakal ngnep dsini lg klo ke bali!!
title: Honeymoon

text:
Pertama kali masuk Hotel Rhadana,  woow unik bgt interiornya,  pada saat check in, kita ditawarkan beberapa thematic room, dan saya pilih , business room dgn thematic DJ. Sayang bgt karena hari itu ada jadwal meeting panjang diluar,  ga
bs nikmatin lama dikamar, pgn bgt tidur seharian,  berasa second home disini, nyaman dan bersih. 

Lokasi strategis, mau kemana2 deket. 

Staff nya sgt ramah sekali. Breakfastnya OK. Poolnya bagus. Dan amazing dikamar disediakan mukena. Alhamdulilah bgt pas ketinggalan. 

Thanks Alot Rhadana , Pasti kita akan balik lagi. dan rekomen ke temen. Sukses selalu 👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻
title: Second home, 👌🏻👌🏻

text:
Thank you for Rhadana Beautique Hotel ..
Tempat yang bagus, nyaman, bersih, tempat yang cocok beristirahat menghilangkan rasa lelah 😊😊
Terima kasih sudah memberikan tempat teratas agar bisa melihat pemandangan yang begitu cantik 😍
Terima kasih sudah memberikan tempat yang membuat teman" saya say "so beautiful hotels, i'm like it" 😍😍
Sooo .. BIG THANKS YOUU .... RHADANA BEUTIQUE HOTEL 😘😘
from : Bank Mandiri Purwakata Kota Bukit Indah (Citra, Bita Sandri, Febri dan Teguh)
title: Yuhuu ..  Holiday

text:
Hotel ini terletak di jalan raya Kuta persis depan hotel Haris Riverview. Hotel kecil yang memiliki kamar unik yaitu mempunyai tema yang berbeda disetiap kamarnya. Breakfast lumayan, namun jika menginap lebih dari 3 malam di hari ke 4 coba cari sarapan ke pasar kuta untuk variasi. 
Anda bisa coba sop kepala ikan mas dwi yang berada di dekat hotel, rasanya beda dengan sop ikan mak beng atau be sanur.
title: Hotel yang strategis

text: Hotel yang mempunyai dekorasi unique. Pencahayaan bagus. Bersih. Bed sangat nyaman. Pool bagus untuk berenang. Resto desainnya unik. Breakfast mantap. Staff ramah dan sangat membantu. Lokasi strategis. Diseberang hotel ada mini market jd mudah untuk belanja kebutuhan. Very nice hotel.
title: Unique Hotel

text: Pada saat itu saya sedang membawa rombongan ke hotel tersebut, dan ini pengalaman pertama saya mencoba menggunakan hotel tersebut. Saat saya berangkat terlebih dahulu kesana, diluar pikiran saya ternyata hotel tersebut nyaman, pelayanan yang ramah pada saat tiba di hotel tersebut, dekat dengan minimarket, bank BCA, lokasi menuju ke pantai juga tidak terlalu jauh. Dan yang paling penting lagi tamu saya puas sekali dengan hotel tersebut.
title: Lokasi yang strategis

text:
saya menginap sini 2 minggu yang lalu dengan pasangan selama 2 malam. 
menurut kami hotel ini menyenangkan dan memiliki pelayanan baik dan staf yang ramah. kami dapat kamar dengan balkon -- sangat menyenangkan! 
Sarapannya lumayanan tetapi kurang variasi. Pada pagi hari pertama, staf menawarkan hindangan telur untuk sarapan tetapi pada hari kedua tidak menawarkannya lagi -- entah lupa atau tidak tersedia...
internet/wifi di hotel ini lumayan lemot (modem berada pas di depan kamar).
staf yang sangat ramah dan ingin menolong bila ada yang bermasalah -- pasangan saya kehilangan kartu atm dan staf keamanan (bernama Suandika) bersedia meminjamkan sepeda motornya (gratis!) untuk melapor ke bank selama 30menit.
title: hotel menyenangkan dan memiliki pelayanan baik

text:
Selama 2 hari menginap di hotel ini .
Menyenangkan . Pelayanan memuaskan . Stafnya sangat ramah . Fasilitas memuaskan, dari personal maupun umum . Swimming pool bagus, enak . Di kamar terdapat fasilitas ibadah lengkap (saya muslim) Al-Quran dengan dwi bahasa, sajadah . Sangat nyaman sekali .
title: Hotel yang menyenangkan

text: menginap 2 malam di rhadana kuta bali sangat berkesan dimana saya dapat kamar yang ada tematiknya sepeda gunung digantung di dalam kamar, luar biasa idenya hotelnya bersih dan staff nya ramah-ramah. dan makanannya enak serta kolam renangnya cozy
title: hotel yang bernuansa tematik

text: tempatnya nyaman, makanan enak, pool yg bagus, stafnya ramah2. Lokasi yg oke banget dan dekat ke pusat berbelanjaan dan kuliner. Buat para Traveler ini cucok banget buat referensi anda semua untuk berlibur ke bali.
title: Homey Hotel

text: Rhadana kuta, hotelnya kecil tapi bagus sekali. saya tinggal dengan keluarga family 6 orang semua fasilitas disediakan seperti hotel bintang 5, kolam renangnya bagus, wifinya kuat dan untuk yang beragama muslim mungkin ini hotel yang baik buat kalian, karena restaurantnya sudah mendapat sertifikat HALAl dari MUI,  jadi saya tidak  ragu ragu .
title: Small and Beautiful

text: Liburan kali ini saya dan teman-teman ingin merencanakan liburan yang murah dan hemat. Dan kami pun memilih hotel Rhadana yang harganya cukup terjangkau. Tiba di hotel Rhadana kami merasa sangat nyaman karena hotel tersebut cukup bersih dan pelayanan dari karyawan hotel yang sangat ramah kepada kami dan selalu siap membantu apa yang kami butuhkan.
title: Liburan

text: Saat merasa jenuh oleh pekerjaan.... saya berniat untuk liburan sejenak.... saya melihat sepintas hotel Rhadana di pinggir Jl. Raya Kuta.... sepertinya menarik....walaupun saya tinggal di daerah denpasar, saya langsung mencoba untuk memesan 1 kamar.... setelah saya check-in di Rhadana... rasanya nyaman sekali... staffnya ramah semua.... kamar bersih....
title: Selamat berlibur

text: The room is clean and the bathroom as well. It has adequate facilities and the price is reasonable for a hotel with such a strategic location. However the AC seems to be unmaintained in my room because during my stay, the room is not cold enough.
title: Decent hotel, bad AC

text: My fiends and I stayed here for a conference and we were very satisfied with the facilities and food. The ambiance reveals the cultural diversity of Indonesia. Food is not too spicy nor bland. There's great fusion between the Western and the Indonesian palate. Very near convenience store and other mini marts.near money changer office.
title: Best Choice Ever

text: The location is very good as it is right in front of a 7/11 store, ten minutes (by car) from the airport, five minutes (by car) from the International Hospital, ten minutes (by car) from Kuta beach and the big and popular Beach walk Mall. You could also walk to the mall / beach in 15 - 20 minutes. - Very nice, clean and cosy room and bathroom. I especially loved the big photograph of the Balinese temple behind my bed. - The Staff were very friendly and helpful. They always had a genuine smile on their face. They gave me a nice room near the pool.
title: Very nice hotel in a super convenient location.

text:
By accident  of booking, the three of us landed at a hostel along the busy center of Kuta. The noise of life music  dawn there intercepted our ears in the bedroom.  Very unpleasant I almost get trauma to search another hotels via Google but  late in the night I decided to book in Rhadana hotel for one night for the next day. My friend left to Gili the next morning and my husband and I moved to Rhadana. The two  of us was so happy when we entered the lounge of Rhadana hotel. Spacious and unique though very simple.
We arrived at 11.30 and understood that check in time is at 14.00 hours. The receptionists were so friendly to give us a glass cold drink and we were allowed to go to our room an hour later. When we were in our bedroom, we decided right away to stay longer in that hotel. The room is clean and has good amenities. The swimming pool is good enough to stretch our body in the water and the breakfast is fine.
The money we spent in Rhadana is definitely worthy.
title: Never regret with this choice

text:
Maybe it should be more detailed when cleaning the room, I saw a spiderweb on the wall of the room.

Ac swing stuck can't move.
No facial tissue in box facial tissue at the washbasin.
Jet shower toilet bowl sounds like a very loud whistle.
TV channel in room are not available, restaurant menu in room not available , telephone instructions in room not available.
Only bath towels available, hand towel and face towel in bathroom not available.

My bed is double but you use 2 single sheets in my bed, maybe you lack stock of double sheet.

Very disappointed with the food at the hotel, the breakfast buffet is very basic and limited, the breakfast & reception is one area, when guests check in and check out and the guide driver comes they can see us eating and are very annoying.

I stay at Studio Room 4421
Date 15-16 February 2019.

Tense way to finish our vacation.
title: HOLIDAY TENSE

text: Does not meet a 4 star standard . The lobby and breakfast area is quite small. Plus the breakfast is so so. Expected better. Room service is good though. Did not have any other meal so no idea about that. The pool is also quite small, and nothing to enjoy. Also the shower in the pool area was broken.
title: Not up to the mark

text: For the price paid, i feel the room is small compared to other four star hotel. Overall the room is clean and tidy. It has a small swimming pool at the back of the hotel.  Breakfast is good and delicious. Staffs were friendly and welcoming. Highly recommended for Muslim travellers.
title: Comfort room and Good Breakfast

text: The room and toilet is very clean. Breakfast is not bad. The only problem is I book using agoda 3 person for 1 room but during check in the room can only accommodate 2 persons and cannot add extra bed because the room not big enough for 1 more bed. End up 3 person, 1 queen bed for 3 night.
title: Cute Receptionist

text: We loved this hotel and all it’s little quirky corners. The room was very comfortable and clean. Breakfast was always amazing and the dining are was a little dream to sit and enjoy. We loved the wood carved window screens, the fresh flowers and the food. There is a pool although we didn’t get a chance to to use it. The hotel is situated on a very busy road but you would never know that once you are inside. There are halal restaurants and mosque about 5-10 mins walk down the road and 15/20 mins walk to Kuta beach. I would definitely stay here again.
title: Quirky Halal hotel in centre of Kuta Bali

text: The hotel atmosphere was quiet and calm. all staffs were friendly.. very cheap and good. But when v went thr due to earthquake we struggled a lot. But the staffs were very helpful and did however they can.....
title: Friendly environment

text: I arrived in Bali after 10pm and needed a place to spend the night near the airport. Check-in was quick and efficient and the staff are warm and friendly. I was informed that a quran, time for prayers, a prayer mat and prayer robe for ladies are available. There is a musollah should I wish to perform my prayers there. My room is clean and comfortable. It is themed for a motorcyclist enthusiast - Good thing I know about Harley Davidson :D (Guess my daughter was not aware of this when she booked my room). The food in the hotel is halal and I like that they provide a 24-hour room service. Buffet breakfast was good - local & western cuisine. Would definitely stay here again if I need a place to stay in Kuta when I visit Bali in future.
title: Real value for money & Muslim-friendly

text: checked in for first time to this small boutique hotel was a surprise, the reception guy Merta is full of welcoming smile, fast speedy check in. Room we took was a STUDIO type and very comfortable and instagrammable, we chose Airline themed room and there was an airline galley / trolley in the room. Bed was king size, tv , ac, hot water was working well. Room was very clean, breakfast was lot of variety and choices and tastes good too. We love the indonesian food. Noven the server was very helpful when we watched football in their cafe de dapoer. VAlue for money for what we paid. Thumbs up for the SERVICE. Will come back
title: Small boutique hotel with sincere SERVICE

text: We booked first night a premium room with a balcony, the room is small but clean and comfortable, tv got multiple channels of entertainment , bed was so good. Despite the size of room, the service compensates it. The security Hendrik was very good in greeting us, the reception guy, Merta was very courteous and efficient in check in ( very fast ). We had one time dinner at their halal restaurant and the recommendation from Adi ( the waiter ) of oxtail soup was superb. Breakfast was lot of variety between west and east. We had potatoes, sausages and some salads and fruits. Check out was smooth too. The staff here is cool. 2 thumbs up for service.
title: small in size , big in service, value for money

owner_response.text:
Dear anabelyamamoto,

Thank you for your complement and feedback. It was nice to meet you at Rhadana Kuta Bali upon check in and glad that you enjoyed your stay thoroughly. The staff here already missed you and they all look forward to having you back next year.

Salam hangat,

Merta Utama
Asst. FOM
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: heard of Rhadana from a friend who just stayed there last month and thought would give it a try. we booked in a studio with a themed of beatles and felt in love with the space and the 3d effect. service must say very friendly and helpful people. check in was seamless and only 4 mnts, Eka the reception was pretty informative in explaining the facilities. Breakfast we had is up to our expectation, lots of variety for the price we paid is really value for money. wish could have stayed longer here. our favourite boutique hotel so far
title: Petite Boutique hotel with a friendly service and a character room

text: Our 5 days n 4 nites stay was excellent. Nice and cosy boutique hotel. Friendly and attentive staffs. Serve very good and Halal breakfast. However the road in front was always jammed with traffic. Do consider to take Grab to and from Airport. Will save on transport. Cost less than 25K from hotel back to airport. Guess will cost almost the same getting from airport to Rhadana. Wifi was very good too. We got good deal when booking Rhadana. Enjoy our stay fr 29/3-2/4. Thank you Rhadana
title: Amazing stay

text: Absolutely stunning Hotel Experience! We got studio 3D room its was awesome, bfast really good especially the classic style poach egg with fresh baked toast and dont forget Bali Coffee, one cup its not enough :D, staff its really friendly and genuine. We will come back again!!
title: 3D Room Experience

text:
Nice and clean hotel, close to the airport, good breakfast, very nice pool!
The hotel is a bit far from the city and the way to the city is not so nice, on a poluted road. The city is however not really worth visiting.
title: Nice hotel, relaxing pool, a bit far from the city

text: the hotel is tidy, clean with cool ambience and hospitality from the employees. We paid for values. the room may not be big as I chose studio size but comfy. Had to go to anywhere by car/motorcycle as the location is quite far if we just take a walk even to Kuta beach
title: Recommended Place to Stay!

owner_response.text:
Dear yazmin m,

Thank you for sharing your experience in the Trip Advisor and great to learn that you enjoyed the value for money products and our sincere service.  Studio room is the most popular room at the moment as you experienced it yourself, it is spacious and the room themed is also interesting. 

Once again thank you for sharing and we look forward to having you back home here at Rhadana on your next trip to Bali.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Be careful ! Attention , during the cleaning of the room was stolen money from the safe deposit box! It happened on the last day before check out!!! The hotel manager and everyone else of course pretended that this was the first time.Hotel staff wasn't helpful at that moment ! All they say : you can go to police , do you want? Thats all ))) Hotel staff just say : it is impossible . But fact is a fact ! Police? How can we go to police in last day , when we check out ? Hope no one will be robber at the hotel Rhadana anymore ! Big disappointed of staying in Rhadana hotel!
About the location of the hotel: If you are without a bike - do not choose this hotel: the trip to the sea takes 30-40 minutes on the dangerous road with big traffic ! It is really far from the sea. The area near the pool is small.Pool on foto huge but in real smaller . Breakfast (during the week the menu did not change): Chicken, rice or noodles, boiled vegetables, bread and butter, coffee/tea/juice/milk. And you can order 2 egg. Thats all.I think it's not enough and for 4 star hotel it is not too much . Other food (chees, salad,croissant ,bacon,sausages you can eat , but for extra money )))
title: Rhadana,Kuta In my room was stolen money from safe deposit box  !

As we have explained to you how disheartened we have been and a serious, proper complete investigation with Head of Security had lead to a no theft evidence, we have move this case to the legal division, and should you wish to proceed further please do not hesitate to contact us directly and our legal team will be delighted to assist.

text: Rhadana is a Nice friendly service and comfortable room . We paid for values. Room May not big but comfy. AC works well. TV has international Channels. Breakfast was basic but Ok for 2 nights stay. Location is also strategic for us . Easy access to Denpasar . Coming back Definitely to this hotel
title: Friendly Hotel Nice Room

owner_response.text:
Dear Gigih W,

Thank you for sharing your experience in the Trip Advisor. We appreciated your kind feedback for your 2 night staycation. We love to recommend our studio room for your next Bali trip as they are much more spacious in size.

Once again thank you for sharing your experience and we look forward to be your second home again on your future Bali trip.

Asst. Group GM
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
From the outside and the lobby of the hotel it looks very nice and smart. The staff were extremely welcoming when we first arrived and we received a welcome drink each which was nice. 

We were taken up to our room and were quite disappointed with the size of the room. We're backpackers and have been travelling for three months now and this was probably the smallest hotel room we have stayed in. If you were a single occupant I'm sure this would be suitable, however for two people with two large backpacks it was a real squeeze and not particularly comfortable. 

We also found roughly 10 bugs/mosquitos flying around the room when we first entered. We went down to reception to complain about the bugs and were given some mosquito spray to spray around the room. The spray did not deter the bugs so unfortunately we had to deal with this for the three nights we stayed which was not very nice, they even appeared in the shower. 

We also noticed that there was no shower gel and also no hand towels, which you'd expect in a decent hotel. We received one tiny shampoo for the whole three days and this wasn't replenished once. This is also the first time we've had this in a hotel. It did seem like the hotel gave the bare minimum of 'extras'. 

I have read very good reviews re the studio room, however this was way out of our budget. 

I must add that the staff were very helpful and pleasant, especially the cleaners! 

Hopefully this review can be taken constructively as I have also read rude responses from management on other people's reviews if they were slightly negative.
title: Disappointed

owner_response.text:
Dear Emma B,

Thank you for sharing your review in the Trip Advisor and complementing our staff. We were disheartened to learn that your stay was not up to your expectation. We took your feedback constructively. Rhadana was built to give a homey feel to our guests and we treated our guests like our own family, therefore we love to hear from our guests objectively if there were any concerns that we could assist to fix during their stay. 

Located in the tropical island of Bali, there were times where uninvited tropical little creatures are in season, despite the daily regular pest control. We tried to accommodate different guests with their different requests and normally we suggested guests to book a studio room if guests are expecting extra space of which the size were stated on the website and on line agents to avoid dissapointment before making a reservation. We also provide a community based soap bar and shampoo to support the local people and they are environmentally friendly. Our Housekeeping will replenish these amenities when it is finished as part of the standard and if it was not, please accept our apology for the overlook.

Once again thank you for sharing your constructive feedback and we hope we could be your second home again on your next trip to Bali island.

Salam hangat,

Made Rahmawati
Asst. Group GM
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We stayed here for two nights at a studio room Romantic. it's Clean, spacious and comfortable rooms with halal certified food and Very suitable for Muslim traveler. Unfortunately did not get to feel the hotel pool because it is open at 09:00 P.M
title: Bersih, lega dan nyaman dg makanan bersertifikasi halal

text: Check in fast, they also provide welcome drink. Room is clean. One of our room there was a bike attached on the wall above a bench, unsafe. Convenient for muslim traveller because This hotel is halal certified. Breakfast must be improved to make it excellent.
title: Nice, clean hotel.

text:
Loved the strong wifi, had a 24 hours mini mart for essential stuff right opposite the hotel. Great value for money. Close to places in kuta but pretty far away from other locations like ulwatu, ubud north and east Bali. Traffic is horrendous in this area which makes coming in and going out of the hotel quite difficult. However if you are looking for day trips and don't mind a bit longer drives this is the place for you. Room service has great food and staff are extremely courteous. KFC and dominoes within walking distance, atms close by for quick cash. The security guards are really helpful and friendly. Quick laundry turnaround. Great AC Andy clean bathrooms. Great pool.

Traffic around the area, was horrendous and incredibly slow when we visited but keep in mind though that we visited on the holiday of Eid so it was bound to be crowded.
title: Great stay, excellent staff, wifi and amazing value for money and it's facilities.

text:
We stayed here for two nights at a studio room, which was "combi van" themed and was massive room with a nice bathroom. The pool area was also really nice, but I saw some people had to wait for sun chairs since they did not have too many and they were usually occupied. I don't have anything bad to say about this hotel, it was lovely...only thing I had a problem with was breakfast, as a westerner I don't like to eat rice and chicken for breakfast so for me they had very small variety of foods there. They should offer banana pancakes too!
Anyway nice stay!
title: Nice stay at Rhadana Kuta!

text:
Had a lovely week exploring south Bali using Rhadana as our base, it was a lovely hotel! The rooms were clean, if a little bit too small, stunning pool, the staff were polite and professional and did anything they can to help. They sorted a rental scooter for us at a great price and even let us leave our large luggage with them when we left for the gilis.
We liked it so much we are staying there again the night before going to the airport.
Highly recommend this lovely hotel!
title: Courteous and pleasant

text: We stayed here for 4 nights and enjoyed our stay. The room was great and very clean and the swimming pool area was good. The breakfast wasn't the best but all in all we enjoyed the hotel and the staff were lovely.
title: Lovely

text: coming from japan, we compared boutique hotel and rhadana has an excellent quality in cleanliness, excellent in service and the room is comfortable. food we had was only breakfast and for the price we paid is lot much cheaper than in tokyo, so no complaint. wifi could have been faster.
title: on par with japanese top boutique hotel

text:
been in this place 2 times and allways very nice surprise!! All the best and keep the good work!! 
I will be back soon,veru nice stuff and service!! Close for everything and the place around the hotel is very nice too!!  See you guys next time
title: Nice place!

text: Balinese breakfast is a star. Location is a little far from the tourist destination but it's nothing a motorbike can handle. There's a bike rental nearby and the hotel staffs are really nice and accommodating and helpful. Our room is okay i just thought i can pick the room theme but nonetheless it's okay. Everything is good.
title: Recommend it.

text: Despite the small size of the hotel, the room was clean, check in was fast and staff was friendly at the reception. the room is nice and got a character, we stayed in Harley Davidson room and there was a big Harley leather jacket in the room. good for instagram. we did not stay too long this time as we had to rush back to jakarta but overall the bed was comfortable, the toilet was clean and water has got a good PH ( some hotels in kuta got high in PH and get your skin slippery ). the breakfast was good value for the price we paid. the Chef ( i think his name was philipus ) was interacting with us and other guests and very nice to know him. Ayu and Merta at front desk were also nice and helpful. Recommended hotel for those who does not mind with size but looking for value for money and clean hotel with good service
title: Value for money, clean room, helpful staff

text: You get what you pay for. This is a clean, no-frills hotel with a good location near the airport. Crisp modern design. Rooms are compact. The queen sixe bed is two beds pushed together, but that said, the mattress was extremely comfortable for me. We did not eat here. But, in-and-out-, it suited our needs well, and was a good value. We would return here.
title: Clean; Good Value

text:
It's worth every penny you have spent to be there... The staffs are really friendly and always serve you with a smile. The staffs are dressed in the traditional Balinese attire and are always smiling.
They are really polite and will try to help you with all you queries. The food in the cafe inside the hotel is marvelous. 
I will visit Bali again, as I fell in love with it's art and culture and architecture. And every time I am there, Rhadana Kuta will be my first choice.
title: Awesome place and awesome people

text: we stayed in so many boutique hotels in bali and Rhadana has got souls and the people are so genuinely friendly. Despite a short stay of only 5 nights, we came to know the staff slowly as they are engaging and make us feel homey. Ayu the reception girl was always smiling, Eka the guy who checked us out was also friendly. Ismanto the security guy ( sorry if the spelling was not right ) always crossed us the street whenever needed. Breakfast was not that lavish but for the price that we paid at rhadana was value for money. The pool during day time was good to chill out, not that big but very alluring. The room we stayed was the bike room ( real bike hanging ) and this is the first kind of room we ever saw. cool overall. come back next year.
title: service from the heart

text: Booked at this petite Rhadana for few nights as friends recommended this but ended up for a week. we were assisted and welcomed by front desk girl Ayu with ful of smile and efficient service of 4 minutes only with welcome drink ( we actually prefered a warm/ hot tea in the evening ). room was decent in size and comfortable and clean, hot shower was nice and tv got cable movie. the pool was romantic at night as we love hanging out there but there was no fb people to order food, so we have to go to reception / lobby. Food was good especially the Indonesian food, we met chef , Mr. Philipus and very courteous. the cappucino we ordered was a shame not that great but hoping the fb manager will train the staff. the housekeeping is also great , our room is always clean. All in all the staff here is the best and we will for sure recommend this boutique hotel to our friends in June
title: Excellent petite hotel

text: Rhadana is probably the friendliest boutique Hotels we stayed in Bali . We only experienced this hotel for 12 nights but the strong homey feeling is there. Security staff always crossed the street for us. The reception eka and ayu are very friendly and helpful. The coffee in our opinion can be more consistent. Sometimes the cappucino is Good but some other Fb server brought a not so Nice cappucino. Anyway this hotel and room is clean and staff are helpful and friendly. We will come back for sure
title: Best boutique hotel in term of service

text:
Though my stay was only 2 days, this is the kind of establishment I would remain loyal to and recommend to others. The staff was quite attentive, the location was most ideal and the facilities were clean and fully functional. 

For my entire stay in Indonesia, I stayed at 3 different properties and the Rhadana had the cheapest rate of the three. Being the cheapest didn't deter them from delivering the best value though. Noteworthy as well, is the hands-on approach of management. The GM made an effort to be a visible, present, and an approachable figure and this reassured me that the service delivery would be of exceptional quality. 

I'd recommend the Rhadana to any visitor seeking a hassle free, cosy, Balinese hospitality stay. It was a pleasure being a guest there.
title: Cosy Room, Hospitable Staff

text: Not a bad hotel but the room was in need of many repairs and updating, it's very very old. The main problem for my family was how far this hotel is from any tourist area. It is TOO FAR. During the day the walk to the normal part of Kuta was at best unpleasant. At night, the walk to Kuta tourist area was downright DANGEROUS. There are HUGE holes in the footpath (under holes is very very big and terrible smell sewage water...really bad.) and the people at this end of the town seemed very unpleasant and not as friendly as normal Balinese people. It is a very dirty tired part of Bali. I spent a few days closer to Kuta beach at the Mercure and instantly regretted my wasted money at Rhadana. Next time when my family come to Bali I will look at the map closer, so this is not Rhadana fault that they are in a very bad part of Bali...you just need to look at map. Rhadana is nice if there is no other hotel in good area of town. Very recommend.
title: Lacklustre disappointing hotel.

text: Two jointed beds they give instead of one double. No balcony. No even a window. The air conditioner was making horrible sounds. Food is not so bad. Staff is polite, good service. Everyday housekeeping. Nice swimming pool.
title: Rhadana Hotel
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
Perfect! Nice cute rooms, clean and perfect size specially for solo traveller. 

Pool area is nice and sun is shining there until 4pm. Big swimming pool! 

Staff is so nice and warm! Always smiling! 

I liked the breakfast, but for a dinner I would go eat somewhere else.

Wifi works perfectly!

Location is by a busy street but rooms are still quiet.
title: Value for money indeed

text: Used Bluebird Taxi from hotel to the airport. It costs only 55.000 IDR(including airport parking 10.000 IDR). Room is small but well-organized. Recommended for Muslim travelers. They Provide Al-Quran in the room. Staffs are good and rooms are clean. Swimming pool is great. My wife loved swimming there. They offer buffet breakfast which includes American, continental & Indonesian breakfast. Overall it's a great experience.
title: Good stay near Airport... :D

text:
The best part about tyis hotel was the staff. We were greeted every time we crossed any one of them. Each and every one from the staff carried a very cheerful smile. However the only part that put the hotel down was the breakfast platter. The buffet had three dishes and a couple of fruits and choice of egg preparation. The dishes usually included:
Dish 1) Steamed Rice
Dish 2) Dry roasted meat in any sauce (pepper or plain butter garlic mostly, both of which didn't go well with plain rice)
Dish 3) Fried Rice/Noodles.
This however will still not stop us from staying in this lovely place when we visit Bali the next time!(THANKS TO THE LOVELY STAFF)
title: Rooms: Excellent, Staff: Excellent, Buffet: No Good!

owner_response.text:
Dear 562sanjayj,

Thank you for sharing your experience and the compliment towards our staff in the Trip Advisor. We are delighted to learn that you will plan even to come back on your next trip to Bali. In regards to Rhadana Power Breakfast, allow to enlighten that the main course or hot dishes are freshly prepared everyday by our Chef and his culinary team and it is of different menus as you may have experienced it. In addition to that we also provide toast, fruit selection, free flow juices, coffee , tea and milk. Egg station at guests preference is also available. We believed our reception has explained all about this to you on arrival and if guests would expect a few other dishes, our Chef is delighted to cook it as an extras as listed on the menu.

Once again thank you for staying. Our Chef and everyone here are also looking forward to having you back home at Rhadana Kuta Bali.

Salam hangat,

Budiman Widjaja
General Manager

text:
Clean room
Breakfast not so many choices, if u late for breakfast then nothing left for you. Nice food if u order ala carte and of course its halal. recommended for muslim tourist.

Friendly and helpful staff.
title: nice place and halal food

text: our nyepi in bali this time was at rhadana , small boutique hotel but the service and the staff were friendly and excellent. we paid extra to get upgrade to studio room in the beatles theme and satisfied, the room got a lot of character and spacious studio. the guitar of beatles and the pillow and the wallpaper was so cool. the service is great, we ordered most of the time room service for food except breakfast at their coffee shop, they called it rhadana breakfast ( we were shown the photo before check in ). For the price we paid, it is worth it and value for money. We will inform our friends to come here . the only thing they don't have is the view , we were aware as they are not beach front.
title: Nyepi silent day at boutique hotel rhadana

text: came here because of friend's recommendation. turned out to be very content. arrived nearly midnight and was greeted by reception guy who was very efficient and friendly i check in, only 3 minutes we were escorted to our room and the housekeeping assisted with our luggage. our room included breakfast and the indonesian selection was good,not a big eater though but for the room price we paid, it is so worth it. day time spent our time in their beautiful pool. night time we went out to explore kuta for night life. once we had dinner at their halal restaurant and their oxtail soup was very yummy. our stay was not that long, only 4 nights but worth it. ayu the reservation who assisted us, bid farewell on departure.
title: small, value for money and excellent service

text:
I love short getaways with my family and do so every few months. On the recommendation of a friend, I booked the Rhadana in Kuta and was pleasantly surprised.

Even though it is not in the midst of the action, it was still very easy to get to the beach and the hotspots in Seminyak. Notwithstanding, the many eateries, convenience stores and spas in the neighbourhood were sufficient when we didn't want to venture far.

We stayed in a premium room and had selected an aviation theme as my 12 year old son is obsessed with WWII planes. The room was comfortable and most importantly, clean. Oh, and given that it is the hot season now, the AC in the room worked extremely well and we could adjust the temperature accordingly.

The TV and cable options were good and the reception was clear. What annoys me the most is settling in for a marathon night of cable watching only to discover the TV is barely watchable from the interference!

We had a great start to the mornings with a swim in the pool. It is true to the photographs and clean!

Even though there was no conditioner supplied by the hotel and only shampoo was given, the overall standard of the hotel and exceptional service from the staff was second to none. Englan who manages the cafe is extremely helpful and added to the homely feel.

I will definitely be staying there again and recommending it to my friends in Singapore!
title: Perfect example of a homely boutique hotel in the city

text:
- Stayed: Feb 2017
- Room type: Premium Double
- Price: $45AU
- Room Pros: Clean, good A/C
- Room Cons: Sound travels easily through the walls and ceiling. Light sleepers may find that an issue. Bed was quite hard. (could be a plus for some but not my preference)
- Pool: The pool was absolutely beautiful. Great spot to relax. 
- Location: Only a short walk to Kuta beach. Easy access to money chargers. Close to decent coffee shop/s. 
- Transport: Easy to find and multiple options available

- Comments: We landed around 9:30pm and stayed at Rhanda overnight before heading off to Candidasa the following day. The hotel is clean, tastefully decorated and the staff are fantastic. Room service for all meals is available, and a buffet breakfast is provided in the morning. (The rice dish was amazeballs) 
Rhanda is absolutely perfect for an overnight stay - couldn't fault it - but if in Kuta for longer I would likely choose somewhere else due to the small size of the hotel and its surrounds.
title: Overnight stay at Rhadana Kuta

owner_response.text:
Dear Jo J,

Thank you for sharing your review in the Trip Advisor. We appreciated the feedback and the complements towards our breakfast, the pool, cleanliness of the hotel and our friendly staff. We were sorry to hear that our bed was not up to your liking and your sleep quality was affected. 

Once again thank you for sharing and wish you a great day.

Salam hangat,

Rahmawati
Asst. Group GM
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We are a couple who love to stay in boutique hotels whenever we travel and this time our pick was The Rhadana Kuta Bali. Before we booked, we browse their website and learnt that this is a small boutique hotel ( not by the beach ) but to us it does not matter as we saw the rooms are themed. We requested the reception guy ( Eka ) for aviation room.
Our room is not that big but enough just for the 2 of us. We only stayed for 5 nights but enjoyed it. We spent almost everyday by the pool which was beautiful and serene. The girl who cleaned our room we forgot to ask her name was very hardworking and friendly, our room is very clean and comfy. One day we got a scooter and went to the nearby Kuta beach which is only 5 minutes away just to watch sunset. 3 Nights we had dinner at Cafe de Dapoer and it was delicious as we only like to tried the Indonesian food ( we had the fried oxtail, ayam betutu, fried rice, Indonesian noodles ). The best about this hotel is the staff, security always helped us to cross the busy street. The reception and the restaurant girl ( Ela ) always greeted us by name. Very homey indeed. On departure we felt very sad as we almost get to know most of the the friendly staff here and also the manager who was friendly to assist us with some local sightseeing information. We defenitely will come back to Rhadana.
title: Sad to leave Rhadana Hotel

text: The Rhadana is a good place to stay in Kuta: Friendly staff, clean rooms, nice breakfast. Ten minutes walk to the village, 15 minutes to the beach. Nice pool, good Wifi. The rooms towards the street are a little bit noisy, as the traffic is quite heavy.
title: Clean, friendly, good base

text: Had a great stay at Rhadana Hotel. Staff were very friendly and assisted us with whatever we needed. Breakfast was good and the pool was fantastic. Comfortable rooms with spacious bathroom. Not too far a walk from beach.
title: Great stay!

owner_response.text:

Once again thank you very much and the entire team of Rhadana Kuta Bali look forward to having you back home here when your travel plan leads to Bali again.

Budiman Widjaja

text: We was very happy to stay in Rhadana, it is very clean,queit and nice hotel. Very friendly service. Highly recomended! Easy to conversate with service and get the best for both sides. Thank You. Hope see You soon.
title: Good Hotel.
