text: We, my family and I, have a great time staying. It's nice, clean and enjoyable for family. The food is absolutely halal. The location is in strategic location, such as 15 minutes to Kuta Beach. So, I'm very much recommended... :)
title: Nice and very welcoming

text: we were booked by our family for only a weekend stay. Thankfully we selected a studio room with a volkswagen theme. despite a short weekend stay, we enjoyed thoroughly, the pool was nice during the day, we spent most of our time there. they don't serve beer but we dont mind. our room includes breakfast and we particularly like the indonesian food but not the bread. free wifi is another plus thing. the front manager merta is very funny, love to make a joke, the other manager forgot his name is very friendly and engaging. we will recommend this hotel to our friends who will come from London next month for small gathering
title: Friendly service, clean room

photos.caption: day time swimming is nice. night time is too quiet

text:
Clean room
Delicious breakfast and of course Halal Food for Moslem
great pool for my kid
strategic position, near to everywhere ex : Kuta/Legian Beach or Denpasar City
Will definetely Come back to cafe de Dapoer Kuta
title: Good Hotel for family

text:
Its nice hotel with very good service
The food is good uts halal food so for muslim its ok
All people are very nice
very quiet place
Very clean
Not bad things to say s for this hotel
Just little bit far from beach 20 mn by  feets
title: Good hotel

text: Cafe de Dapoer Kuta is a Nice halal cafe With delicious breakfast selection. I enjoy end coming here and Had breakfast , they got indonesian yummy food , choices of bread and fresh lokal fruits and jamu the herbal drink. The atmosphere of cafe de dapoer is Aldo Homey With a Lot of wooden furniture. The staff at the front was So friendly and I was greeted by the manager who introduced himself , everyone is So heart friendly and welcoming. Will definetely Come back to cafe de Dapoer Kuta.
title: Nice cafe in Kuta for indonesian food With friendly service .

text:
We just stayed for 1 night but they had everything we needed. The room and shower bit small   Frig TV coffee and tea making facilities and fresh milk on request
 Also has a pool  Nice  buffet  breakfast
 Very friendly staff and close to Kuta without the crowd and noise. Recommend for a good 3 star hotel reasonable rate  booked on line
title: Good small budget hotel

text: Love their hospitality, food, design, and room. I will come back for more. Wish I could get another room, besides "Garuda Indonesia" room. They should give an airport/hotel "pick-up" service in case for check in/out.
title: Warm Welcome

text:
pro:
great location (near convenient store)
staff is very very helpful
nice room even a bit small. but still comfortable
reasonable price
good service
have prayer amenities( completed)

cons:
a bit small room
title: nice and reasonable price hotel

text: Stayed for one night & loved it. I got in from the airport late at night and they were happy to help me to my room. Buffet breakfast in the morning was only 50,000 and really nice! Thoroughly enjoyed & got a great deal on the price too!
title: Awesome

text:
Stay at Rhadana for 2 night. It was a nice short stay. Love this hotel as it is value for money, serve halal food option and the staff is friendly.

The check in is very smooth as we arrived very late at night around 2am i guess...Thanks again!
title: Good budget hotel

text:
We stayed at the hotel in January 2017... the staff were so friendly, kind and perfect. They couldn't do enough to help you right down to stopping the traffic to let you cross the road. 

We travelled as a couple and were glad that this is an alcohol free hotel.  It makes for a peaceful night in my experience. It is walking distance from the beach (15mins) but thankfully far enough away from the madness and noise in the centre.

My next trip to Bali I will surely book to stay again. beautiful pool area also, although sadly during our stay we never had the opportunity to use it due to the Bali rain. 

Breakfast was fine... I notice a lot of reviews mentioning the poor quality. Personally, I found it to be OK. Fresh juice, great coffee and a selection of continental and traditional foods. Fine by me. The only thing I would say is maybe get down early for breakfast as perhaps if it's close to the time to clear up... certain dishes may have gone a little dry in the bamburees.

lastly, I think and feel the hotel was good value for money... it's rooms are clean as is the entire hotel. 

I look forward to seeing you all again in the near future and thank you for a very pleasant stay.
title: Restful, peaceful and above all helpful

text: I stay 3 days in the Rhadana hotel makes me feel so homey with the staff that was so friendly. the room was clean and quiet. The breakfast was good with halal food. really enjoyed during stay in rhadana. so recomended!
title: really enjoyed

text: Overall, nice, clean hotel and room. Service by the staff are also satisfactory However, hotel location is not close to most attraction and require walking on uneven or non-existent pavement, might trip and fall. We had it worse as it was night time and raining hence walking is a challenge
title: Budget and clean

owner_response.text:
Dear Lai Wan L,

Thank you for sharing a review in the Trip Advisor and complementing our staff , the clean room and Hotel. Being a boutique that offers value for money, naturally the quality service and the condition of the Hotel is of most importance and we have been living up to our reputation because of those aforementioned qualities. In regards to location interestingly many guests actually like it as it is not in the crowded and most touristy area but guests enjoy the easy access to go to shops, beach, etc. As for the public area it is beyond our control and one is advisable to get some transportation at night especially in rain.

Salam hangat,

Budiman Widjaja
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Clean hotel but lacking in any character. Staff were pleasant. Key card required for power in the rooms, meaning the air conditioning isn't on unless you're inside. While this is environmentally friendly, if your room gets a lot of sun, it will be really really hot by the afternoon. The air conditioning was pretty weak as well, so the room took quite a while to cool down. 
Hotel is very Muslim friendly with prayer mat, multi lingual copy of the Quran and arrow pointing to Mecca. Breakfast was also Halal.
title: Clean, sterile hotel

owner_response.text:
Dear TomF878,

Thank you for sharing a review in the Trip Advisor and complementing our Hotel's cleanliness and pleasant staff. We were somehow perplexed to read that hotel is lacking any character while in contrary to all of other guests were saying the hotel is full of character from the perspective of the theme, the decor, the atmosphere and most of all the friendly and personality of our staff. 

In regards to the key, yes we are an environmental friendly boutique hotel and for the size of the room, the AC is more than sufficient as the installation was done by a professional AC expert & techinician and this was the first feedback we received that AC was weak whilst other guests said sufficient.

Salam hangat,

Budiman Widjaja
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I had a short trip to this hotel in dec 2016..
it was a wonderful hotel clean and good HALAL FOOD ...
rooms are tidy clean and simple the decor made it more interesting 
the lobby is small but can make do
the eating area is small but their food made up for the small space 
the variety of food presented is wholesome and looks suoper good 
upon tasting i know its a hotel to go to next time ...
I hope they will Expand their hotel ..
title: HALAL EVERYTHING

text: Hotel staffs are very kind, helpful and understanding. Breakfast also not bad. Room is totally clean even a bit small, worth to stay. Just 15 mins to walk to kuta beach and market. Thank you so much for hotel staffs for helping us whichever we needed.
title: neat and tidy to stay for budget

text:
I liked the wide bed although the room was small. The swimming pool is also very nice. The price is very competitive. The restaurant is OK.
No cereals for breakfast but compensated by a lot of fruit and warm dishes
title: Nice surprise in the center of Kuta

text: There was some issue with our booking, apparently I had booked a twin room so they swapped it for their "largest" room which was roomy and had a view. Was very noisy at night from the street traffic. Room was clean however. Everything was a bit of a walk away ie beach. Staff was not friendly but not hostile either. Breakfast buffet was cold, not a lot of options.
title: So so

owner_response.text:
Dear Shabana B,

Thank you for sharing a negative review in the Trip Advisor. We were in a complete shocked to read your statement as it reflected your poor and subjective judgement over Rhadana. We have never indicated that we were on the beach first of all and you should have known of our location prior to book the hotel if you were a discerning traveller. In contrary to your review of breakfast buffet, we received so many positive and good feedback from our guests all over the world, we do understand that food is subjective and if all of our guests said our food is hot and has a value for money, then your statement naturally poses alot of question marks.

Last but not least, our staff received so many compliments because of the friendly and sincere sevice and this is the first time we received a contradictive comment. We are for your information also reviewing our guests and will alert the Hotels and Restaurants Association of the negative guest to be blacklisted.

Salam hangat,

Budiman Widjaja
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
The hotel is in Kuta... not really close to the beach. But it's a very nice hotel. The breakfast is lovely-- fresh juice, fruits, meat, coffee, danish...nice assortment. 

Free wifi -- in your rooms and everywhere

Room-- clean and nice. Each room is decorated with a CDs and record of a musician. I wanted to the reggae room-- didn't get it though 

Service. -- very good! Staff is polite. 

Amenities -- there are shop around you can get snacks and local food..CHEAP!! :)
title: Interestingly nice

text: The rooms are comfy.. small but with all the amenities, hospitality is good(that's of course the case when you are in bali) It's little far from the busy and happening part of kuta, still worth every penny spent.
title: Nice hotel

text: Helpful staff, clean environment and comfortable rooms. Each room comes with a theme, and I find it very amazing. Love the air cond in the room, it is very cooling. The room and bathroom is very spacious too.
title: Worth the money

text: We just went to Bali for Honeymoon on this December, and I requested for a Romantic Room, we got an upgrade from business to premium room with Romantic Theme and Honeymoon Set, very very nice, we love it! The free buffe breakfast was very delicious and most of all, All the food and drinks are halal, the hotel itself is muslim friendly, and the receptionist was very humble and nice, we felt so much comfortable :)
title: A Comfortable, Muslim Friendly and An Understanding Hotel

photos.caption: Honeymoon Set In Romantic Theme Room

text:
The staff walks around with a smile and is very willing to help with anything you need, the rooms are not very big but they are very well decorated and the bed is comfortable. 
The breakfast had a decent range of options. Good enough for several days in a row. During my next stay in Kuta i will definitely stay here again!
title: Very pleasant stay!

text:
Good staff reasonably priced hotel.
What I liked was the location.........not busy and crowded what you normally encounter on beaches and busy streets.
You can get good food  on a walking distance from hotel.
Rooms are well maintained and nice baths. 
Quick service and hygiene were the highlights.

Kaveri
title: Decent and quiet  place

text:
The hotel crews were friendly and the environment is clean with a hint of Bali-ness western fusion. The room was great too - clean and neat. It may to small to some people, but not as small as those inns in Tokyo (gosh after opening your luggage your walking space is gone). 

Overall I think it was a comfy stay over here. I wish there were more food stalls outside (like... just right outside of the hotel).
title: Small but Still Good

text: Checking in and out was a breeze. Staff was very friendly and efficient. We booked 2 rooms and was given a 3rd room free due to booking.com promotion. Kids got the scooter room and they loved it. The adults got the Harley Davidson and house DJ room which was just as good. Cleanliness of the room and hotel vacinity was tip-top superb. Cant believe this is a boutique hotel. It is comparable to a 5* hotel due to its service and cleanliness.Accessible to many choices of delicious street food and warongs plus atm is just next to the hotel. Breakfast choices was limited but delicious and ample. We wouldnt ask for anything more for the price we paid. Wifi connection is very strong and cable channels are clear. Will definitely make a comeback. Thank you Rhadana Team for the great hospitality and keeping the place so comfortable.
title: Great, Amazing and value for money

text:
Stayed for 4 nights. Almost everything was great from staff to bedroom. Only 2 point to highlight: 

1. There's one night it was raining and the balcony was almost flooded and seep thru our room. No choice have to use towels to block the rain from getting in.

2. Understand that this is a boutique hotel so breakfast choice is limited. But to eat the same thing for 4 days? Perhaps you can try to rotate the menu every 3 days for longer staying guests.

Other than that everything was just so good especially the staff being so friendly, nice and helpful.
title: Friendly, helpful and nice staff. Great value for money

text:
I stayed here for 5 nights in December. There was a problem every single night. The room is small but got everything I need. On the first night, air con was terribly noisy. Second night, the engineering person fixed it but the sensor had stopped working, the air con had gone to automatic setting and the remote couldn't change it at all - the engineering people fixed it until after mid-night. Then, the day before our departure, we asked reception to helped us to book the car&ferry ticket to Gili Island. One male staff promised to help us but after an hour, he never called us back. Then, we spoke to a lady who works the morning shift, she told us she can't help us and we just need to Google!! How on earth can you talk to guests this way?! 

I must say, apart from her, all other staff are very nice. Food is good - both dinner and breakfast. 

Pro- friendly staff (mostly), good food, good value rooms. Travel agent across the road which can help booking cars, tours etc.

Cons- very noisy (both in the morning and late at night). People screaming in the street late at night. Pool is very small, pictures were misleading.
title: Average - probably overrated

owner_response.text:
Dear 369hildaf,

Thank you for sharing your review in the Trip Advisor and complementing our good food and staff. We were somehow confused as previous and current guests who stayed in your room had never had a problem despite their much longer stay and it was confirmed by our engineer team that the AC was just operating normal. On the Gili island information, our staff tried to give you the information while waiting for the ferry's confirmation but turned out that you were rushing and pushing for information which the staff obviously were not able to decide but had to wait for ferry's confirmation, therefore she only suggested while waiting , you may wish to search and probably get a faster information. After all we do understand that The Rhadana Kuta Bali may not be of everyone's cup of tea , we were so grateful to our guests and even more more repeat guests who stayed back and appreciated the experience of homey stay in our place and did not judge "overrated". We in fact are also reviewing our guests' attitude and behaviour and would share those negative ones in the Bali Hotels association for their alert.

Salam hangat,

Budiman Widjaja
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: At first i thought  with my budget i will get regular hotel, but when i stay at rhadana what i feel is completely beyond my expectation. the hot feeling when on driving the road completely disappear when i walk into the lobby, the lobby very cool hotel provide me welcome drink upon check in. an the breakfast next day is really satisfying with omelette sausage coffee and nasi goreng. the room very clean  and not only room, corridor, lobby even pool really clean. and that what i  think the most important thing here. i stay for 2 night here and the staff really friendly.
title: Clean, Friendly staff and value for money

text: I stay for one night at rhadana hotel kuta with my family...for me rhadana is a good and nice boutique hotel in kuta...location is not so far from kuta beach....easy access to seminyak and legian....this hotel is a good choice for moslem tourist...they provide al quran and salat set in room...and they also serve halal food...thanks rhadana for your kindness to my family...i will be back for my next trip in bali...
title: Friendly

text: I stayed at Rhadana for the past week and in my 30 years of life I have never had a sweeter, kinder and more attentive staff.  I arrived at 1:30am in the pouring rain, they had a gentleman outside to cover me with an umbrella until I got in.  The breakfast is very good, giving you options of "American" and Indonesian foods. Make sure you choose a package/room where this breakfast is included. The dinner in the evening was amazing also, that fried oxtail I kept reading about before I came here is AMAZING.  Make sure you eat it. The room was clean and perfect size for myself. The pool in the back was a great relaxation spot for the days Kuta has YOu exhausted. Back to the staff - thank you to the security outside who always helped me cross that crazy street and would get me a taxi every time I went somewhere. The housekeeping also does laundry for very cheap, thank you for that awesome service. The front desk staff for helping with all questions and queries and they even came to my room with a cake and sang me happy birthday. (Im serious, check their Instagram, they have a video up of it)  If I ever return to Bali I will 100% stay here again. Loved it. Thank you Rhadana for the awesome week there.
title: Love. Love. Love.

text: Stayed for 7 days, Love the theme rooms and spacious room with unique collection of the owner in Hotel area. The staff always greet you with smile and very helpfull. location is strategic, not really in crowded and noisy kuta area but you are easy to access tourist area like seminyak, oberoi or even legian. Lot of good food near the Hotel but you have to try the restaurant, 'Cafe de Dapoer'. They served halal food, with homey ambience, it feelks like you are coming to grandmas house, look old but not old fashioned. My favourite is sop Buntut si Mpo and Pisanf bakar si abang for dessert. Pool is nice.. and romantic for night swim after long walk around the city. Very recommended.. it is worth it with the price!
title: Best Boutique Hotel in Kuta Area

text: love so much this small boutique hotel rhadana, halal food, genuine service and bob marley room our favourite. merta is always there to help us when we need, ayu the reservation is always smiling and speak good english. we love the staff, we love our second home rhadana kuta
title: Still the same , homey, friendly, 6th visit

text: As a single female traveller I felt safe at Rhadana throughout my stay. The staff constantly predicted my needs, from the welcome drink to opening doors when I had my hands full. The decor is well finished and elegant. 100% would stay again.
title: Safe and homely

text: This is the kind of boutique hotel we like. we stayed away from big hotel. reception Merta called us by name with smile. waitress Ella and Mega always said good morning and called us by names too. Chef was good and always say hello to us at breakfast. room was clean and pool was romantic. very homey
title: Boutique hotel with personalized service

text: Thank you Rhadana. I was supraised with clean room, little balcony,  a comfortable bed, antique furniture view in the restaurant, friendly and efficient check in staff.  And this is really friendly for moslem group.  Excellent!
title: Rhadana, nice hotel, great location, moslem friendly

text: Stayed at Rhadana for 1 week & really loved the pool & the morning breakfast was one of the best iv had so far 😉 the room was clean & no road nise so easy night sleeping 😉 i would definitely stay here again totally worth it 😎
title: Best place to stay near kuta

text: Weekend stay at Rhadana was awesome. We got this hotel from friends recommendation and totally happy. Pool is romantic , breakfast is delicious , room is very clean and Wifi is good. Value for money. Special note to reception staff who always help us to book blue bird taxi for us. Also the room service was good. To go to the beach just minutes  away by bike . Lots of eateries and shops in Kuta beach area. We definitely recommend Rhadana Kuta Bali. In fact next year we will come with more friends
title: Nice hotel

text:
Great hotel!
Excellent customer service, great rooms, fabulous pool area, lovely breakfast.
Always a member of staff outside to help get a cab or get you safely across the road.
About a 15 minute walk to the main area, but it is an easy walk or no more than £2 in a taxi! Would highly recommend
title: Amazing value

text:
Pros:
- Friendly staff
- Someone is always at the front desk and outside for security
- Clean pool
- Clean room

Cons:
- Minimal options and average breakfast
- Small bathroom, especially the shower (even if you're petite)
- Was charged for an international free collect call

My credit card company blocked any possible  transactions with my card despite me telling them of my travels, so I needed to call them. I had an international collect call number and when I explained this to the staff they seemed unsure at whether or not I would be charged for it. They told me if their system picked it up as a "free call" then a charge would not accrue, otherwise there will be one.

I was confident I would not be penalized with any charges, especially after speaking with the bank representatives to confirm of the said free international call. When it was time to check out,  I had a bill under my account for multiple calls. 

The hotel charged me for calls that never went through. Ones that were completely invalid numbers as I was trying to make an international call. When I pointed this out the staff he agreed to remove them from my bill, but how are you asking me to blindly trust this 'system' when it clearly cannot differentiate an actual call to ones that never connected in the first place. It does not seem reliable or accurate at all.

I begrudgingly paid as our driver was outside waiting for us. The bill was no small amount. I am hoping to be reimbursed by my bank.

With this issue, there was a lack of any support or empathy from the staff. The mindset of 'whatever the system said, goes' was off putting.
title: Overall good, but problem with making toll free calls

text: experienced a few nights at Rhadana was a home sweet home experience rather than a hotel. they are not as big as hotels in the surroundings but the service is very personalized , friendly and efficient. Room got themed and very clean. Will recommend this to our friends
title: Petite boutique hotel but excellent in service

text: Stayed at Rhadana Kuta Bali for few nights and was completely happy. Check in was efficient and staff was friendly. I got the destination themed room and it was super clean , bed was comfortable. The pool was nice and relaxing. The cafe has a good selection of breakfast and value for money for what we paid for. Will definitely return. Thank you for making my stay a pleasant one
title: Nice and Friendly Boutique Hotel

text: this is my first hotel in Bali.This hotel is so clean and friendly it's lovely. The room service is great and Breakfast was good.. Thanks for all your service, Terima kasih juga kepada abang security.. one day i will come back see you again
title: FANTASTIC HOTEL I EVER BEEN

text:
A stop over at Rhadana for a night was awesome. Hospitality at hotel is really amazing. Breakfast was good as well. 

Wayan, who parks his taxi before this hotel was guide for our entire tour. He way really helpful. With out him we wouldnt have covered all places in and around Bali. Price is also very reasonable.
title: Great stay at a very reasonable price

text: I stumbled upon this hotel on tripadvisor and I ended up reading some reviews which most people stated they enjoyed staying in this hotel. I also read that each room has different theme which I think is really unique. I decided to book one night stay at this hotel and how true! My room was a surf theme and very comfortable. Check in was fast, the guy in the front was very friendly and helpful. The only negative point is there is no space for parking! The security told us we could park at the back but since it was full, we had to keep the key at reception. My friend and I went out for dinner and asked the staff's help to take our car to the frontbut no one could drive. It was not an issue but I just found it really weird and funny at the same time.
title: Amazing room theme!

text: Staff at Rhadana are nice, our room was clean and tidy, the lobby was nice and clean. The pool was also nice and tidy. Location was good, shops across the road, Mal Bali Galeria was a 30min walk away.
title: 1st stay in Bali

text: The staffs are very friendly, the room was very clean and comfortable. When u walk out of the hotel, u can find many restaurants and a mini market, close to the airport, very easy access. Most of all, it's a muslim hotel
title: Great price, comfy, great location

text:
The hotel had a really authentic vibe and was modern and clean. We ate in the restaurant one night and thorough enjoyed some local cuisine with super fresh ingredients. The breakfast was included and did not disappoint with a nice selection on offer. 
The swimming pool is small but a great place to relax from the hustle and bustle
title: Top class stay

text: We stayed for a couple of nights only... the service was good, food decent and the hotel rooms were clean and nice.. it was nothing fancy and we were not expecting anything fancy at this price. the hotel staff were cooperative and there are departmental stores just across the road if you need something.
title: Value for money

text: We stayed 2 nights at this hotel on our way out of Indonesia. All staff members were very friendly and helpful. Location is perfect - 20 minutes by taxi to the airport and 15 minutes by foot to Jalan Legian. Pool is nice. Rooms are cute, clean & comfy. Can't really fault it for the price we paid.
title: Super friendly staff

text:
I went to Bali on 14th October 2016 and stayed in this hotel till 19th, the rooms are neat and clean with all the aminities including ultra modern washroom.

Morning buffet breakfast was a spread of fresh fruits, bread butter and jam, chicken, noodles, boilled rice, and fresh omlets prepared to our taste, overall breakfast was very tasty and filling.

Swimming pool was fantastic, the gym adds to the variety, prayer room was blissful, there is a conference hall in the top floor.

Overall very comfortable stay and I will definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and relatives.

Thanks a lot for everything...
Loving you so much...
Peacefully yours.

Bon Voyage !!!
Enjoy !!!
title: Comfortable Stay !!!

text: This hotel is so clean and friendly it's lovely. The room service is great as I see the breakfast. Definitely not a party hotel as alcohol not permitted so it's a nice place. A quick ride in a taxi to legion or 5mins on a bike. Overall a nice place.
title: Lovely place to stay

text: Been here at Rhadana Hotel, nice homey atmosphere of Cafe De Dapoer, yummy Halal Indonesian food and good traditional Balinese coffee.Love hanging out here with friends. Service is friendly & efficient. Will definitely be back
title: Halal food at its best at Cafe De Dapoer

text:
We booked this hotel for just 1 night to stay at bali und wait for our transfer from denpasar to Jakarta. We expected alot, since the Hotel was rated on place 1 for the Region Kuta. Long story short: our stay was outstandingly good. Excellent room service a very nice pool and the staff was extraordinarily helpfull and nice.

The hotel in general has a nice style. I guess the rooms are themed differently, wich in my opinion is not needed but nothing negative.

keep up the good work!
title: very very Clean, insanely good price performance ratio and a very nice Hotel overall

text: Didn't stay there. Visited the hotel for the cafe. Beautiful interior and decoration. Staff are so nice. It's halal, clean, cheap and delicious. Recommendation: club sandwich and hotdog. Spacious, clean prayer room available, together with telekung. Very convenient. Visited the cafe twice during my trip. Will definitely stay here on my next trip.
title: Delicious, Affordable, Halal Cafe

text: love this petite Rhadana. everything is personalized, staff called us by name and always smiling like Mertha, Eka and even the security. Room is so clean and comfortable. They got good Indonesian food at their Halal restaurant. Recommended
title: Great Value for money, Great Service

text: Deciding not to stay in a resort, we choose Rhadana hotel based on TripAdvisor reviews. :) It proved that it was a good choice for us. Staff is very friendly, hospitable, always smiling. Rooms are not very large but space is enough. The hotel is very clean, contrasting with the surrounding area. The interior design of dining and reception area is very nice. We have discovered an amazing oxtail soup "Buntut"  at the hotel restaurant. The dinner at hotel is very good, although sometimes "slightly spicy" was "very spicy" for our taste buds. But this is the charm of Asian cuisine! As a minus, for us was the breakfast without any European food. If you are traveling with kids and are addicted to  flakes, no chance to have it, even if I asked. Pool is not very large, but is clean and no crowded. Just fit for purpose.
title: Visiting Bali, accomodation in Kuta

text:
I spent a week in Kuta. My comments:
+ Outstanding friendly & helpful hotel staff 
+ Room with mini-fridge
+ Hotel very clean from bottom to top
+ Good match in terms of value for money 
+ Breakfast Ok

- Kuta beach is not perfectly in walking distance (> 1 km). Along that busy main road there's partly no pavement. But no worries. Taking a Taxi in Kuta costs almost nothing.
- The hotel is located at a main road. Although all rooms are heading side/back it won't be ultimately quiet.

My summary: Very good middle class hotel. I'd book it again.
title: Very good middle class hotel with excellent service

text: The hotel is clean in a not bad place it took me between 15 and 20 mins to reach the beach in foot however by taxi it will take 5 mins maybe a bit more because of the traffic, the staff are AMAZING they're so helpful and friendly, they helped me with a lot of stuff when it comes to places and the money and how I pay because the currency in Indonesia is in thousands so I wasn't sure how I deal with it, there's a place exactly beside the hotel so you can change currency and 2 supermarkets open 24/7 just across the street, the hotel also not so far from the airport and they can call a taxi for you and it will cost between 100,000 and 150,000 depends on the traffic and also for your own sake do not take a shuttle from inside the airport because it will cost the double because it cost me 300,000 which is a lot, so just go outside the airport and take a taxi and try to get with a good price between 100,000 and 200,000 but not more than this, last but not least if I had the chance to go there again I will!
title: So nice

text:
The room was clean, and has a swimming pool at the back of the hotel.
The hotel is located by the busy street. there is a small complex with KFC, supermarket and small restaurant about 300meters from the hotel. but the street traffic was very busy, be extra careful to walk on the street.
title: Clean room

text: Only stayed for one night however by the time our flight landed and we got to the hotel it was 3:00am. We were very relieved to find that we were able to still check in reasonably quickly and without hassle at such an early time of day. Welcome drink of mango juice was lovely however we would have appreciated it more if it wasn't so early in the morning. The hotel room was small but certainly comfortable. The bathroom was tidy and compact but useful. Two king single beds were pushed together to make one big bed and this wasn't a problem for us, the beds were also very comfortable. Hotel was close to a busy Kuta road so was a bit noisy in the morning but wasn't unbearable. We slept through breakfast however it was well priced at 50,000 rupiah per person. Check out was at 12 noon (which is the normal time for this hotel I believe) which was fantastic as we had gotten in so late. Good staff, quality room and good location.
title: Fantastic hotel

text:
I just returned from Bali and couldn't  wait to write about "Rhadana". It's such a nice boutique hotel with a homey atmosphere. All the stuffs were very friendly and co-operative and their services were excellent; specially the waitress, the front office lady and the Security Guys. The security guys bid us with a smile everytime they saw us and came to help us cross the street. I stayed at a bussiness room with my wife and kid at 1st floor right behind the pool. The pool area is fantastic. One most remarkable thing about this hotel is cleanliness.  There is a Minimart, Q-mart and q closer to the hotel where one can buy uaeful things at any hour. 

And last but not the least, the foods of the restaurant were very delicious and yummy, specially the breakfast. I stayed for 3 days and there were variations in breakfast items everyday.  Their egg omelet is superb. 

I would recommend everyone to stay at Rhadana for good value of money. I will definitely come here again.

title: Boutique hotel with friendly service

text:
Initially, I had a hard time choosing where to stay in Bali but upon staying in Rhadana in our first two days, I believe it was the right choice. We arrived at 1:00am in Ngurah Rai International Airport and the taxi's and local transport would be persistently asking you to ride with them. Good thing Blue Bird taxi is also 24/7. 

Anyway, I thought staying in Kuta would had us up the whole night but the location of Rhadana is perfect for several reasons: 
1) It is just 15 minute walk to Legian street for party lovers 
2) Beside Rhadana are 2 local cheap restaurants which serve good Indonesian good. 
3) For those wanting to try Babi Guling, there is one just 10 minutes walk from the hotel 
4) Travelling to Uluwatu Temple and Bedugul (Taman Ayun and Tanah Lot), the hotel's strategic location will cost you less compared if you are staying in the likes of Ubud and Nusa Dua 
5) It is very close to the airport, around 10 minute from the airport. Our taxi only costs us Rp39000 including parking. 
6) There are also two banks within 20 meters from the hotel, and also a money changer beside the hotel. There is also a 24-hour convenience store in front of the hotel. 
7) Unique themed rooms in a modern cozy setting. Buffet breakfast and coffee is also good. There is a lovely pool as well. 
8) There is also a tourist information center right in front of the hotel where you can book your tours in Bali. 

Our Bali Experience was capped off by our guide in front of the hotel. His name is Wayan. He is a good host, a very safe driver with a kind heart. He speaks good English as well and never rushes against time. He cares more about his reputation more than anything else so I would highly recommend him in case you guys are planning to go around Bali. 

In fact, since we were highly impressed with Day 1 (Uluwatu Sunset), we booked him again for Day 2 (Bedugul Tour). If you're planning to stay in Kuta with a balance of quiet atmosphere, I would recommend this hotel. Kudos!
title: Modern Hotel In A Nice Location and a very good driver and host!

text: I felt like staying in my own home. All staff were very friendly and helpful. Hotels rate is cheap but the service is very nice.  The room was very unique, it has special theme in every rooms.  And the food its also fine...it is nice to stay in this hotel.

text:
Positives
1) we stayed in a premium room which was a bit small but cozy
2) the staffs a were very nice & always smiling
3) the room & washroom was clean
4) Has hair dryer in washroom
5) the plug points in Indonesia is round 2 pin in a whole and I use flat 3 pin so when asked for an adopter they immediately provided it.
6) 12 minutes walking from Kuta night market & 15 minutes walking distance from Kuta Square & max 20 minutes walking distance from Kuta beach
7) interior of the rooms & exterior are nice

Negatives-
1) the breakfast menu was a bit disappointing (we stayed 5 nights)
2) mirrors are all in washroom
3) me & my friend stayed in a double premium room but they provided only one pair of slippers
4) not enough space in washroom to dry cloths so once put the wet cloths in the veranda and at night I saw one of my t-shirts was gone (flown away by wind), BUT next day one of the friendly ground staffs returned it to me. Many thanks to him :)
5) No early check in

Dear Mabel D,

text: The concept is quite interesting in which each room is decorated based on random theme (our group stayed in different theme: rimantic, batik, bicycle, beach, bob marley, volkswagen, surfer, etc.). Other than the decoration, the hotel is pretty basic and on the small side, which is the typical budget hotel size, for thwme room and bathroom. If you're tall caucasian, you'll be squeezed in, especially when taking shower. Interestingly, this hotel provides quran, saroong, prayer clothes (mukena), and prayer mat (sajadah). However, the room is quite small that there's barely enough space to take decent prayer ritual (shalat). Breakfast is very basic with choices of local dishes, white bread, croissant, and fruits. You can order eggs, but you'll have to ask the waiter for it. Nice pool that is located in the 1st floor for an afternoon dip. Overall, nothing too outstanding about the hotel aside from the thematic rooms.

text:
I choose this hotel because #1 in list of TripAdvisor for hotel around Kuta and frankly speaking is not much different with budget hotel but clean room. In my opinion, this hotel is not more than 3* due to size and facilities.

- Location : Kuta Raya, not even close to Kuta beach. So for people expect to go Kuta beach by walk, need to reconsider (use google map to make sure). There some convenient store and restaurants around the area. ***

- Check-in : Fast and easy plus welcome drink. The customer service brought us to the room and explained on room facilities. Good hospitality. ****

- Room : We booked twin bed sharing and we got twin-bed with no space between beds so like queen-size beds consist of 2 beds. Not suitable to stay with co-worker sharing rooms. Room size was very small and no many spaces to move around and even for big luggage. Not recommended for family with young children. Room very clean and neat. We got room with windows face the corridor (no face outside). ***

- Room facility: Coffee maker, LCD TV , safe box, mini bar, telephone, and small wardrobe with clothes hangers. Free wifi was ok. ***

- Bath room was good size and clean with standing shower but just adequate toiletries such non-liquid-soap and shampoo. 2 bath towels were provided and showed some dullness in color. **

Breakfast: We included breakfast in our booking. Dining place located in reception areas. No many varieties in foods and do not expect bacon and cheese. We did not see the egg station which actually located outside main entrance (strange heh). Tea, coffee, water and juice were available. ***

- Check-out: Fast and no hassle. Taxi booking is also good.

Overall: Just good enough for short trip and if you do not stay in the room for long time. No recommend for family with young children or more than 3 person in the rooms or honeymoon couple :) . Consider to the location, size, and facility, the hotel price was in the high side.
title: Clean budget hotel around Kuta area

text:

text:
Stayed here with my kids x3 in 2 rooms I thought I had booked family room On booking.com I'm still Unsure if they don't have family rooms at all or just weren't able to accomodate? We arrived late at night and I wasn't stressed the kids just wanted to go to bed :) rooms side by side worked out fine really. 

Rooms: rooms are tidy and small beds, tv bathroom tea and coffee facilities and a small bar fridge :) (make sure u turn it to colder as ours in both rooms were not on the colder setting ;) air con works well nice and cool safe from the hair frizzing humidity :)

Staff were more than happy to try and help even tho not all Of them understand English well I'll have to work on my Indonesian too ;) extra water bottles or towels for the pool weren't a problem at all. 
dinner here wasn't too bad eitherthe kids had chicken burgers and I had the chicken stir fry veg good sized portions and cheap :) 

Tips: 
*Check for pool towels before u the the plunge u might need to ask for some :) 
* breakfast is simple but seriously it's only $5 Aussie :) make sure u get there early tho as they run out quickly :) u can ask them to make u scrambled Eggs or Omelette too :) 
*you cannot drink alcohol by the pool or in public areas but you can in your room :) it's a Muslim friendly environment which didn't bother us at all :) 
* there is a 7/11 or deli across the road (I think there are 3 actually :) so drinks and nibbles aren't far away :)

Have a great stay :)
title: Great cheap accom 5 stars for the price and staff :)

text:
After a challenging trip from Java, we were really looking forward to getting to Rhadana as needed a little comfort... And they did not disappoint.  Clean, comfortable and quiet.  Good hot water pressure and A/C... Pricing was excellent and the pool brilliant.  The included breakfast was fine (not amazing, but fine).

On the downside, it is a fair stroll to Kuta/Legian if you feel up some shopping but a taxi will only cost you IRP16k (05/16) so not too bad.

NOTE: For beer lovers this is not the hotel for you.  It caters to a Muslim clientele and whilst you are permitted to sneak beers up to your room, there is no alcohol permitted or sold in the common areas or through room service.
title: Very Clean and Comfortable... Great service staff...

owner_response.text:
Dear Tim R,

Thank you for sharing your stay experience in the Trip Advisor. We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed your stay, appreciated the value for money. As to the alcohol policy, we do advise our guests in advance and interestingly that over 80 percent of our guests are non Muslim and they are still comfortable. Around the Hotel's area there are many options of either 24 hours mini market or cafe / bars that sells alcohol and their location is  just a stone's throw away.

Once again thank you for staying and we look forward to having you back home here at The Rhadana when your travel plan leads to Bali again.

Salam hangat,

Budiman Widjaja
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We had a family trip for 2 adults and 1 10 year old with 2 rooms. Both rooms were meant to have a king bed but instead had 2 beds pushed together, I had said something but told that is all is available. Slightly annoying when you have paid extra for large room with an extra large bed and told "too bad". The breakfast was nice with limited options. The do have room service but have to ask for a menu from the front counter. The staff are very friendly and helpful. The room keeping was well done. The hotel has a glorious pool with a double waterfall and sunbeds in excellent condition. Easy to call front desk for pool towels when they are out. The hotel was interesting and quirky. We loved our stay here.
title: Cute Boutique

owner_response.text:
Dear cheeky2603,

Thank you for staying and posting a review in the Trip Advisor. We appreciated your feedback and compliment to our pool. We are sorry to learn that your stay was not up to your expectation, however the staff actually went to knock your room for the welcome drink but there was no response therefore they decided not to disturb you as you may have rested at that time. The room is themed and design in the most comfortable space which many of our guests appreciated and keep coming back as repeat guests. We do however has a Studio for guests who requested a bigger room. 

As for the breakfast ,we have a selection of bread ( white, brown toast, croissant, danish ), corn flakes, coco crunch cereal , cheese, milk, butter, coffee, tea, freshly juice, potatoes, sausages, beef bacon, eggs on request and some local main dishes. Hence the breakfast is not catered to only Asian and in fact more than 60 percent of our guests in the hotels are Europeans, Australian. It is of utmost importance ,not only that we provide a room with character and other facilities but also the sincere service from our staff that guests appreciated.

Once again thank you for staying and appreciating the value for money offer and we hope that you will come back to experience our Studio on your next trip to Bali

text: Stayed downstairs in a business room near the pool.  Family friendly which is great as many people on holiday, not business, may have a family.  Pool has a children's pool and the regular pool has a deep end; pretty lights at night.  Quiet when we stayed; if you want a resort or noisy night life go elsewhere.  Free wifi.  Good to see the hotel admin working on updating the property - fantastic!  Impressed that it was clean, even the bathroom and bedroom!  The paint on walls was also clean and work was being done to update pool area.  Various trinkets around the public areas to make the place more cozy.  Small library that needs more people contributing books.  Buffet breakfast was included in a nice restaurant area.  Good buffet, better than some other hotels where you pay more for overnight stays; it has more Indonesian food than Western.  Cafe has food you can order for room service or eat in the cafe at the front where you eat breakfast.  Convenience stores very close and local restaurants in walking distance.  They allow you to bring in food, but not to eat in restaurant or public areas.  Kind security guard helps with road crossing.  Friendly staff - smiled and greeted each day.  Didn't charge extra for child staying overnight using the same bed/linens; much better than some other hotels who charge a lot for each child over 2 or 3!  Would stay there again.
title: Nice place, affordable, friendly

text:
My first stay in Rhadana Hotel was in January this year. I was looking for a budget hotel to spend my last night in Bali after a long days of working. Because the hotel is nearby (around 10 minutes' walking) to the Legian Road and Kuta Beach with all their vibes, but not right at the busy center, I decided to book here.

When arrived, I was greeted by friendly reception of Pak Merta from front office and Pak Budi, the GM. They offered me a refreshing welcome drink. The lobby is actually one with the hotel's restaurant which has a unique design that makes you feel like eating in your own grandma's kitchen - very homey.

I got a premium room on the third floor. The room that sleeps for two was rather small but super clean and tidy (which I loved the most). I had the Raja Ampat themed room so I could see all great pictures and oceanic blue color inside.  The hotel has lots of themed room from nature, automotive to music like Bob Marley and the Beatles.

The bathroom was also clean and didn't have that ammonia smell you will usually find in some budget hotels. What I loved as well was the comfortable double bed, so I had a great long sleep that night.

In the morning, I went down to have my breakfast and wow, what the hotel served was actually one of the best breakfast options I've ever had. 

It was buffet but with a lot of choices of meal that you could create on your own, from American to Asian breakfast style that you could also mix. Because they have their in-house chef, of course the food prepared tasted good. The free-flow Balinese coffee was also perfect to start my day.

I haven't tried the hotel's swimming pool and gym room but they also look nice. Well, from all this experience I had had before, I went back to spend around 3 nights at the same hotel this April and Rhadana Hotel still hadn't failed to give me great service and a wonderful stay. :)
title: Clean, minimalist hotel with themed rooms plus great breakfast and friendly service.

The room we stayed is the rice field themed room , unique as it is themed , clean , simple but super comfortable. AC is working , TV is working, Shower is from Grohe. The people / staff here are super warm, friendly, always smiling and greet you by your name. The Chef is also friendly and greet you every morning. The security guys are also friendly helpful to assist you crossing the street. So far this is The Best in Bali. We recommend this hotel !
title: This is one of the Best in Bali

title: Unique thematic room

text:
Had my first solo trip to Bali was a little unsure if I would settle well alone in Bali. Booked Rhadana Hotel through Agoda as the reviews given were all positive. 

Hotel Deco / Facilities - Relatively new. Feels at home with a different theme for each room. Dining area was very well furnished ala Balinese style. Swimming pool is available, tucked in a quiet corner on the first floor. Not that amazing but nice to chill and have a dip.

Service - Warm and welcoming. Each staff will greet you whenever to return to the Hotel. Check in supposed to be at 2pm but since my room was ready, they allowed me to check in at 10.45am. Provided free universal adaptor for me to use without the need to pay any deposit. Had an early checkout and requested for a breakfast box which they willingly acceded the request.

Breakfast Options - If you are not choosy, then it's generally fine. You will have a choice of Fried Rice (Nasi Goreng) or Fried Noodles (Mie Goreng) for the main dish plus your choice of eggs to go with it. Other sides would include, bread with an available toaster, Danish, local sweet cake (kueh) , fruits. Beverages would include fruit juice, ice water , coffee and tea. More importantly, the food they serve is certified Halal by the Indonesian Muslim Council.

Location - Took the opportunity to run in the morning from the hotel to Kuta Beach. Distance is approximately 1.6km. The road in front of the hotel is always busy but the hotel security would manage the traffic if you wish to cross. There are a few local eateries serving Halal Food along the road. If you need to get tidbits or toiletries, there's two minimarts across the road. ATMs were also seen along the road.
title: Feels at home @ Rhadana

text:
The only themed hotel in Kuta with semi museum concept, home sweet home feel, pretty pool and garden, personalized service.

text: My sister and I enjoyed our stay at the Rhadana Hotel and will definitely stay there again. The service is fantastic. We arrived at around 9am, were given welcome drinks when we arrived and allowed to check in early. Mr Merta, the Manager, let us view 2 rooms to choose which one prefer. We chose the one nearest the pool. Rooms are not so big but very comfortable. Pictures at the website are not updated. Actual rooms and dining area are much more lovely in reality. There are a lot of yummy choices for buffet breakfast at their quaint restaurant. When we needed to print our boarding passes for our next flight, they gladly did free of charge. When we checked out, Mr Merta himself assisted us so we could get a taxi and get there in time. We would not have had a great time in Bali if we didn't stay at a fantastic hotel.
title: Value for Money

text: We had a fantastic stay at this hotel. Very clean and comfortable. The staff are extremely helpful and go the extra mile to help. We arrived at 1:30am and our check in was fast. We will definitely stay here again.

text:

Room was smaller than expected but nice decorated and clean. We stayed just two nights and we didn't use the pool but it looked pretty.
