text: second time goes to Bali and i stay at Rhadana Kuta Bali. it was very amazing. i found the most cozy hotel in Kuta Area and staff also very friendly and the room is very clean and comfortable. i'd like to recomend this hotel to all my friends for their amazing holiday in Bali.
title: Cozy Hotel and friendly staff

text: this is the great hotel and cool, i was found staff was very friendly and helpful and room was very clean..i truly enjoy it during visiting bali and stay at hotel rhadana kuta bali...i will recommend for all my friend and traveller when you goes to bali don't forget stay at hotel rhadana kuta bali....
title: Great value and great stay

text: I have stay 1 night at the rhadana kuta bali it was nice to see they hotel concept which is all rooms have a diferrent concept like thematic this is amazing and also the staff was very friendly and helpful and room was very clean and unique it was recomended to all friend and traveller see and visit this hotel when you goes to bali...thanks and have a nice day...
title: Recomended hotel for solo traveller...nice hotel concept at kuta bali...

text: We had a perfect stay at the Rhadana Hotel. It was nice and clean, staff very attentive, spotless, good food and prices, and the room was great to sleep. Wifi works ok. Definitely will recommend this hotel.
title: Excellent value

text: We decided to stay here due to friend recommendation. Process check in was fine, but I should went to reception twice due to card key didn't work and I decided to asked the reception to opened our room. Room was clean and good facilities inside it, unfortunately not complete with room directory also mineral water bottle only 1. Pool so quiet and felt as private for us. Stayed for 2 nights annoyed by TV cable problems and effected that I cant watch Australian Open.
title: Nice budget hotel

text: Small hotel and new budget hotel, very clean.. It has free wifi on the room, and the room was very clean. The hotel has prayers kit such as quran and "mukena" for free to be borrowed. The breakfast meals was good but they dont have much variations and everyday they dont change the menu, so it kinda boring
title: Nice budget hotel

text:
Stayed 2 nights as location near working place. Was informed this hotel opened 2 years ago. Overall, condition of hotel/rooms/restaurant-lobby area is good, well managed. Obvious maintenance work going on; workers along corridor and leave their tools/materials at a corner at night, but was not interrupted in any way as out for most of the day.

1st room on 4th floor - Room had queen size bed, good space, shower-toilet-sink area also well designed. Air condition was not working well, warm. Engineering checked and recommended to change room. Wifi reception was very weak as well.

2nd room on 1st floor - Room smaller than earlier one, shower-toilet space smaller as well, air condition working, wifi coverage much better.

Pool looked nice, but did not use. Breakfast - menu presented, select the items and it is served. Dinner - I had a take away box vs. room service while waiting for room change. It was OK.
Will return again due to convenient location.
title: Good Stay Overall

text:
We spent 7 nights at the hotel and were extremely impressed with how clean the hotel is, from the lobby to the pool area and of course the room itself, spotless!!! Well done!! We especially loved the shower!!! The water pressure was amazing and both the cold / hot water were perfect!! Staff were extremely nice, very welcoming and professional! We ordered room service once to the pool area, service was quick and food was tasty & priced well.
Only downfall would be the noise from construction next door, however it only began 2 days before we checked out so we didnt bother moving rooms. Im not sure how long it will last, however Im sure the front desk would be more than happy to assign you to a room furthest away from the noise should you request it. We highly reommend this hotel and would definitely return!!
title: Wonderful Stay!

text:
We stayed here for one night even though we had planned to stay longer. Our room was not clean at all, and we killed five mosquitos before we even put our bags down.The room was old with old furniture with a very used look to it. It's a little far from the beach, which is no problem during the day, but at night there is no street lighting, so not a nice walk...no restaurants around, either. And the wifi did not work.
The pool looked very nice and breakfast is a la carte and very, very good.
title: Great breakfast, but other than that...

text:
Booked this through my airlines hotel booking service and could not have been more of a perfect pick. Not in the middle of Kuta but even I could walk to the Discovery Mall in 20 minutes. Things nearby included authorised money changer next door, plenty of ATM's, 3 convenience stores across the road, KFC and a supermarket within 5 minutes walk.
The hotel - the room and the rest of the hotel is kept in a spotless condition, a credit to the manager and his team. The front of house staff always ready to help, the restaurant food was fantastic and breakfast at AUD$5.00 was easily affordable for any budget.
The staff - I had a problem with my booking when I arrive which was NOTHING to do with the hotel, rather my booking agency I used. It was late at night and instead of making an issue of it then and there I was given a room for the night. The matter was sorted the next day. The Manager and front of house staff helped a lot and I cannot thank them enough. I found all of the staff to be extremely nice and very friendly, while remaining professional. I always enjoyed my morning talk at breakfast time with the lovely Asih.
All in all, the "Excellent" rating I gave this was well deserved. Thanks team, will definitely be back.
title: What a great find

text: My wife and I recently spent 3 days at the Rhadana hotel. It's an easy 15min walk to the beach and the main Kuta strip.  The room was small, which was fine, but most importantly it was clean and comfortable.  The washroom was equally clean, with new and well kept facilities. The staff are extremely friendly, helpful and full of smiles.  The pool is nice and well maintained. Breakfast is not included in the room rate, but is not bad at all.  Great value for money all round.  I'll definitely be staying here on my return.
title: Great place to stay!

text: I'm not a massive fan of staying in a place for too long, so although I stayed around the Kuta/Legian/Seminyak area for 8 days I tried quote a few hotels and this one was brilliant! It's location is fairly quiet and away from the mayhem, but it is on a main road (well by Bali road standards anyway) it's a few hundred metres down the road from KFC, to get to the nightlife (bars/restaurants/clubs) in Legian you have to walk down a long road and then turn right once you get to the beach, in total walk takes 10 minutes I'd say maybe 15 if you're a slow walker or have trouble crossing a road due to lots of traffic but it's an easy walk. If you turn left instead of right you get towards Denpansar area to the Shoppong Malls/Water parks etc. The Hotel itself is very clean, had no problems checking in all very friendly and brought me up a free welcome drink, the room wasn't the biggest. But was big enough definitely. There is a massive double bed, and the bathroom was nice and pretty modern with all the shower gels shower cap shampoos soap etc, there was a TV with about 40 + channels and  a balcony (although was barely a balcony) maybe room to stand on alone, and look over the swimming pool which is decent size (probably standard Bali size) don't expect a European sized pool in Asia, as most pools are on the smallish side. There is a small restaurant by reception but I never ate there so can't comment on it but it was always empty (to be fair the whole hotel was pretty empty I don't think many people know about it). It's a great budget hotel was the best place I stayed in Bali and the cheapest cost me £9 a night !!
title: Bali's Best Kept Secret

text: I booked this hotel for only one day. But then I extended directly for 2 days more. The hotel was so cozy and clean, this hotel makes me feel just like at home. I have privacy and service which I need for my holiday. Retail market just at front of the hotel. And the hotel is quite near everywhere. the hotel offer drop service to Kuta Beachwalk  and easy to take a taxi to go back to the  hotel after a day enjoyed Kuta beach
title: great Hotel

text:
I went here only a few days ago and it's an amazing hotel! Don't doubt, just book! 
The hotel is not located in the party street or next to the beach which is amazing, since it is therefore also not located in between starbucks and macdonalds. 
You can get amazing and cheap local food, within 10 meters of the hotel. But don't worry! It only takes around 3 min by taxi and around 1 USD. to get to the beaming centre of kuta. 

The staff is super friendly as well, they are willing to help with absolutely everything! They made sure we could get to out next hotel in Ubud by arranging a van and whatever you need they will definitely arrange it. 

The rooms are perfectly fine, it's not super big, but who needs that? Especially for this price!!  Everything you need is there, it's super clean and in general it's just a perfectly fine room!

We really enjoyed our stay here, it's an amazing location with amazing staff. Just book! You won't regret it.
title: Best Hotel in Bali

text: Rhadana is a perfectly acceptable hotel for the advertised price. The location is excellent, and the service, rooms, and food are all just fine. We only spent one night there due to our itinerary. Well recommended.
title: A nice hotel for the reasonable price

text:
Clean room, with thematic walpaper. We book 2 rooms , our rooms have only one walpaper in beside head board.. but other rooms have so full walpaper with mount thematic walpaper.. i think they have different walpaper in every rooms..
The rooms complete with amenities and compliment with coffee, and tea and absolutely water kettle..
The room small but clean enough, bed comfy but tje small pillow a bit smell we dont used it, i dont have any idea they change it or not.. (thats why we put 4 dot)
But over all it was a nice stay.. i dont remember tje name of the receptions but he's offer a friendly services. 
Thank you
title: Nice city Hotel in the heart of Kuta

text: Hotel with thematic room, clean and also comfortable. Because of outbreak, they only serve ala carte breakfast with many kinds of menu. In the room they also provide holy Qu'ran, saroong, mukena and also sajadah. I think this is one of Muslim friendly hotel in Bali, especially in Denpasar.
title: Friendly hotel with nice thematic room

text:
Check in & check out was smooth, hotel is clean and have basic amenities. Breakfast is decent, could have done better. Room service food is so so, was having high expectations for it since I saw it was number 1 amongst the best place to dine for halal food. Bed and pillow are comfortable, room size and toilet is alright for the price you’ve paid. Location wise, it’s near the kuta town about 5 minutes by scooter. Opposite there’s a mini mart 24 hours, lots of halal Warung near by as well.

However, the staff room is not sound proof. You could literally hear someone else’s knocking, I was awakened at 3am and 4am and 5am due to the noises were made by the people who stayed at the same level. 

Regarding the staff, I was very disappointed. Told them I wanted a quite room cause I’m travelling with a toddler, they place me beneath the level for renovation. It started at 8, we were woken up by the sound of it. Called to asked if it was the neighbour upstairs and they said yes, they didn’t tell about the renovations until my husband himself went upstairs to check that was at 4pm. Was very disappointing cause the staff basically lie to us when we continuously complaining about the noise. 2 nights there basically we had no sleep, not happy at all. 

If you’re okay with noises then this hotel shouldn’t be a problem. Other than that, I would recommend other places for the price you’re paying. Halal food is easier to find if you’re around kuta, the only reason I choose this hotel for the breakfast halal option. But other than that, it wouldn’t be my first choice again.
title: Clean, Comfortable But Very Noisy

text:
We stayed here 2 nights either side of our airport trips to another country. The staff at the desk were polite and assisted us with our bags and we were greeted with a glass of water. The room was clean, but we however were disappointed that on both mornings we were disturbed by staff members. Despite our room having the 'do not disturb sign on', two staff members were talking outside our room for 5 minutes. Similarly , the above room to us was being made up in the morning consequently waking us. We were disappointed as we arrived late due our flight and thought it'd be a great place to get some sleep. 

I'm not sure I'd stay again purely for this reason.
title: Clean but not quiet

text:
I was staying in this hotel for my birthday. Before I arrived to hotel a week ago I inform to them m coming to celebrate my birthday. They said they will make my bed n provide a cake. Nothing has happened. Even we forgot to take travel charger or three pin. When we ask from reception they said I have to keep a RS 50000 deposit for each. Normal checking time was 14:00. I arrived around 12:00 they said there is no room available. But if you paid extra room will be ready. They charged from my card for early checkin. Providing 2 small bottles of water per day not even a 500ml. 
People who work in a reception they are very rude. Specially in this hotel they never give any single free glass of water. 
While I was doing my checking I have seen a 3 girls who has done a check out while ago room attendant cane with a bath towel and showing to reception. I am pretty sure it was girls makeup or mascaras. They said to the girls you have to pay for RS 50000 for damaged towels. 
I am pretty sure those girls and no one is going to use hotel towel to wipe or dry ur body. Cox too much old towels and low quality of towels.
I never ever gonna recommend this hotel to any one who is looking for a budget hotel.
title: Birthday

text:
I moving to rhadana after not comfortable with the others hotel and i think this hotel is very good. Clean rooms, helpfull staff and good concept. They provide "mukena" at all rooms for praying. I think not many hotel provide that. 

Rhadana is recommended for long stay in bali, with competetive price and good service.
title: One of the best decision that i ever make

text: A most pleasant stay. Friendly, efficient staff who made us feel so comfortable. The rooms were very clean and comfortable with everything you need, from slippers to tooth brush and tooth paste. We also stayed in a 5 star resort that that didn’t provide a tooth brush kit unless you asked, so well done Rhadana for going beyond the norm. The quirky deco was a great experience. Value for money hotel located 10 minutes from the airport and directly opposite a mini mart.
title: Clean, comfortable and very pleasant

text: Just enough of everything, quite a pleasant and peaceful stay i must say because of low season so not many guest are there but i can definately imagine if i was there if the hotel was full, the wall are very thin we can hear everybody walking, slamming the door and talking loudly and that wouldnt be pleasant
title: Not bad

text:
Rhadana Hotel has good , caring, hospitable  staff  ,nice , clean facilities !!!
The staff will take  care of needs and are reliable, efficient and fast! recommendable!!!  
The food served in their dining area tastes good and recommendable , too! Price is just right! Value for money! Good Choice Hotel!
title: Rhadana Hotel was Like my second home in Bali!

photos.caption: Clean bathrooms and good smell; Just right size!
Just right size and clean, well kept !Clean  towels supplied !
Clean and well kept rooms ; well kept comfortable beds. clean linens and soft pillows!
Complete facilities inside room! View  from room is just fine.
Dining area  is clean and has good food served in style! Prompt service!

text: Value for money, strategic location to stay. Nearby Kuta beach, Ngurai Airport,Agung Bali Mall and various halal restaurant. Best service by most hotel staff. Will come to stay again here for sure when Bali's calling
title: Muslim Friendly Hotel

text: You can find halal food here. It provides breakfast for customers. It has friendly front desk staff and they will answer your questions about bali and so on. Very recommended hotel to especially to muslim and non muslim to stay here. Infront of this hotel also has mini mart and beside this hotel you can find halal food, money changer and also fast foods like kfc and domino pizza.
title: Halal hotel

text:
After I had bad experience in flash blood (refer to this post : https://www.tripadvisor.co.uk/ShowUserReviews-g297694-d4888248-r639117062-Ganga_Hotel_and_Apartment-Denpasar_Bali.html) I booked for 2 nights here.

The staffs were extremely friendly as long you can talk in "Bahasa". Now I found that it's bonus to watch Indonesian Drama during my childhood. 

The hotel is easy access to kuta, legian and seminyak. Easy to get taxi, bike and if you willing to walk about 10mins, you can reach to Kuta most happening places for food, shopping, bars and whatever entertainment you need!.
title: Nice, Cozy and Good Hotel to stay

text:
This is not a top hotel and not to much close to Kuta central area but hotel is clean and staffs are so good. Check in is a bit slow but you get free drink and a family dinner pass for up to 5 people 4 course meal for free. Room is ok can be more modern but is ok. If look is pray cloth under bed and point mecca so think of everything. Try the food, not so good for me, but should try. 
all i don't like is main the england tourist. Most ok but some drunk alcohol an some australian dress clothe not much cloth...maybe a bit respect inside for Shariah.
title: Splendid homey place.

text: This is not expensive hotel and you have accept this and otherwise room is good and almost 100% clean. Check in is fast but there is no assist when i come but i do not mind. All room have theme colorfulls and so happy. Can not make some complains. Happy joy. Nice restarant area and food is ok (food not the best but ok). Muslim hotel good but still my childs see some western lady in bikini...in some near pool. OK sure she look nice but almost no cloth in hotel in front childs I can't take child to swim here. If you look under bed is janamaz (need clean) and some pointing to mecca (i use smart phone...point 7 degrees not mcca but close). I recommend this hotel. If you can't  pay for regular good hotel take this hotel...please be careful in dark on street, this hotel in dangerous distric and also so many hole in road outside you can fall in inside sewer drain and rat.
title: Simple hotel but good

text: I stayed here for 2 nights, the room was quiet small but it was very clean and there was fresh bottles of water and clean towels each day. The pool is really nice and peaceful. Although it’s a bit away from the main area getting a grab in is easy and cheap (about €0.80). Staff are also really friendly. The only reason for given four stars is we could hear any movement made in the room above us and in the halls. All in all We would return.
title: Clean hotel

text:
The hotel is a real value for money. The rooms were clean and nice, the staff were friendly.
The only problem was the location which was not very close to Kuta center, but having rented a motorbike made things easier.
I would really recommend Rhadana.
title: Good hotel

text:
Stayed 6 nights in this hotel in the business room. 
Room is non smoking. Allocated smoking area outside of the restaurant & pool area. Room is a little small but clean. Tea making facilities is available in the room. Water pressure is fantastic for showers & warm water is readily available. AC works jus fine.
Breakfast selection of halal local food is good. Continental bfast was ok but very basic.
Facilities like swimming pool is located at the very end of the hotel. Good size pool with minimal lounging chair. Might have to "fight" for the chair when the hotel is on high occupancy.
Location of hotel is central but away from the hustle & bustle of town & beaches. Alfamart is conveniently located opp the hotel shld u need a quick grab of stuff. Many local warongs outside of the hotel.
Overall, good location, friendly staff & basic amenities expected of a this little hotel is met.
title: Great value & no frills hotel

text: I stayed for 1 night during my transit in Bali. The staffs are friendly and service is great. There are some lights that was broken and they sent the engineer to fix it almost immediately. The room is clean and cozy.
title: Great service and value

text: Room is small but very adequate. Love that they provide power socket on top of your bedside table, makes live easier. Breakfast area very small though, but then again, this is the kind of hotel just to get a good night sleep and not to linger around.
title: Value for money

text: I travel a lot in Indonesia and have been many times to Bali so I can share that as for Indonesia the room was veeery clean and was equipt with all neccesary accessories. I like it. For sure I can recommend it for short term stay. The breakfast is not to good - but again in most of the places in Indonesia  food is not that good in general (this is my personal opinion)
title: Clean and good quality for this price

text: Go for hotel radhana if you choose to roam around the city and use hotel for the purpose of rest only.Because rooms are smaller.But they provide you a great service and a best complimentary breakfast which is value for money.Its in kuta city only.You have money exchange and minimart nearby.Dominoes and KFC available ata a distance of 0.5km
title: small rooms with fabulous complimentary breakfast and service

text: I find the room a bit small but for the price that we paid, it was all worth it. There’s a Mini Mart in front of the hotel which is convenient. Wifi is fast enough and receptionists were friendly. They really were accommodating especially that we checked in really late already.
title: Value for money

text: The hotel is in one of the main roads of south kuta and provide good parking space for vehicles.Eventhough room is small ,it is designed very well and the service of the hotel staff is really excellent.Swimming pool and Gym available.One of the best complimentary breakfast u can ever get.Vegetarioan options are very few in lunch and dinner.Thats the only cons about the hotel.A money exchange is available beside this hotel and a minimart opposite.Dominos,KFC & a big super market available in a distance of 0.5 km.Very near to kuta beach.
title: small but best in service

text: I highly recommend Rhadana Hotel to be your first choice. My room is so amazing. It’s really soothe my taste. It’s also very comfortable and relaxing. The ambiance and aura attracts positive vibes. The staff are so lovely and kind hearted person. They always put a sincere smile into their face. Looks like you are in a 5star hotel. And if you want a 5star guest service when it comes to private transport to explore Bali, I highly recommend Gus. He is not just a private driver, he is also a travel buddy, a friend, a brother. I’m a solo traveler but because of him I never felt solo for my entire trip. I uploaded the picture of my room together with the business card of Gus and our picture together for the benefit of the others to experience a 5star accommodation and private transportation.
title: Highly recommended! You must try!

text: must say the moment arrived in our room was an oasis, ac was cold , shower was good, staff was very corteous, friendly, helpful with so many of our requests. internet was not good but what the heck , we are on vacation. the breakfast choices was good in variety and taste. met Merta the guy who checked us in, speedy. the room is not big but very clean, comfortable bed. dinner was also good, they got ala carte only. recommended this small boutique hotel for value for money for the rate they charged.
title: hidden small gem in the middle of chaotic street, complemented by excellent service

text:
the staff were friendly. each of our request are accommodated. check in was only 5 minutes and comfortable. room is super clean. yes we can not drink alcohol but we are fully aware as it was stated on the website rhadana.com 

the only think was the location, if it would face the ocean would be good but we paid what we get. definitely coming back with more friends. most of the time we use scooter to roam around kuta beach
title: short stay but impressed with the staff friendliness and helpful. will come back

text:
We booked a studio room and was assigned to a very cool Volkswagen themed one. Bright and very clean. Thank you for providing the room with a set of praying needs (sejadah, telekung, kiblat and Quran)! 

Positive notes:
-	Staff at reception always made us felt welcomed
-	Nothing was too much for them, very helpful
-	Food is certified halal so for Muslims, enjoy your meals!
-	If you walk out of the hotel to your left, there is a humble warung nasi padang which sells really delicious and cheap spicy nasi!
-	Location is good. Left turn from the hotel and keep walking, you will see many stores, eateries and eventually you end up at Kuta Beach.
-	TV has great number of channels if you just wanna laze in your room.
-	COO Mr. Budiman is a very enthusiastic and approachable gentleman who personally introduced and brought us to visit Oasis Lagoon in Sanur which is the sister resort of Rhadana. Thank you very much for your hospitality!

Room for improvements:
-	House-keeping should check INSIDE of the kettle in each room. Ours had its metal heating thing turned very rusty. 
-	Small hand towels in the toilet would be very handy.
-	Avail 2 sets of toothbrushes instead of 1 since you’d already know how many guests would be accommodating in a room.
-	Menu for breakfast and in room dining certainly can be improved
-	Gym is of a very cute size. And because of that and the room shape (due to building structure), I believe it may make a difference to the user if you turn the treadmill facing the mirror instead of facing the wall. Oh yes, the yoga mat, please have it cleaned VERY regularly.

Those rooms for improvements are actually not of a big deal in the grand scheme of things. I will still come back here and also ensure that I book nights at Oasis Lagoon too!
title: Great, quaint little hotel!

text: Stayed in this boutique hotel during Nyepi ( silent day ) in bali was amazing. culturally unique, dark and could not go out anywhere. the rhadana people made us so feeling homey, they are friendly and helpful staff. the room is small but clean and we got what we wanted , ac works well, tv they put on movie, shower was good. The food we had was halal buffet and tasty. Chef was there to say hello to us and very good. all in all we were treated well in this small boutique hotel and for the price we paid was so much value for money.
title: Good food at halal restaurant and good service at Rhadana boutique hotel

text: This hotel has 5 crescent stars for Moslem friendly certificate. Located in crowded area of kuta (beware of traffic jam hours), this hotel offers minimalist room with decent facilities. However, I think they shall improve their breakfast menu.
title: Halal and moslem friendly

text:
I have very mix feelings about this hotel.
Pros.
Great looking,great pool, friendly and helpfull stuff. Very clean. Aircon works well. Good location.
Cons.
Buffet breakfast that runs out of eggs.
Have styed at better Hotels for less money in Bali.
Very small shower.
We had to move rooms due to drain smell on 1st floor.
Kids running around and making loads og noise at pool from 7am,pool only opens at 9am.
title: Hit and miss.

owner_response.text:
Dear 112tiaanl,

Thank you for sharing your staycation experience. We appreciated your kind complements towards the cleanliness of the Hotel and the friendliness of the staff. We were sorry to learn that you had to move room due to unexpected circumstances and the faux pas with the egg. Pleased rest assured that we have taken some corrective action and will ensure such thing will not reoccur. Once again thank you for your constructive feedback and we look forward to serving you better on your next trip and stay to Rhadana Kuta Bali.

Salam hangat,

Merta Utama
Asst. FOM
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: short stay at rhadana before heading to airport and pretty impressive. clean room, nice and helpful staff. rate is inexpenisve , great value for money with breakfast inclusive. recommend it to our family for short getaway
title: clean room and lovey staff

text: we were looking at no frills , simple but value for money hotel and ended up to stay here for 3 nights , short but sweet, staff are gems, ayu and ella are probably the most helfpul reception by far. room is basic but all in all give value for money for the price we paid inclusive breakfast. can not fault

text: we love to stay at boutique hotels in Japan and we found Rhadana is very boutique with its concept, small in size but the service is very excellent. this time we opted the studio train station room and it was so instagrammable. our studio room includes breakfast which is appreciated as they tasted good like salad, pasta, potatoes, cereals, milk, fresh fruit, juices, coffee and toast. we are not a fan of the hot asian food. the service of the security was very good, hendrikus and ismanto are cool. Eka at reception and Mega at restaurant are very friendly and helpful. we will come back after new year.
title: Very Boutique, Very Friendly and Value for money

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: we came down from ubud and only stayed short for 2 nights before going to airport. found this small boutique hotel is very clean, warm staff and helpful. we booked directly and reservation was efficient. the rate we paid includes breakfast for 2 persons and it was a value for money. nowhere can get this kind of price with breakfast. good quality breakfast of sauteed potato wedges, cereals and milk, toast, coffee, tea and fresh fruit. we did not touch the asian hot food anyway, so we dont know. farewell was also good, Ayu the reception girl was very pleasant. good value
title: Good value, good service boutique hotel

owner_response.text:
Dear msinclairjpn,

Thank you for staying and sharing your staycation experience in the Trip Advisor. We were thankful to read your review and glad that you enjoyed your stay thoroughly and appreciated the value for money offer. We have passed your complements to our troop ( read : staff ) including Ayu who look forward to having you back home here at Rhadana Kuta Bali on your next trip.

Salam hangat,

Benedictus Jodie
Group General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We got stucked at Rhadana as that time airport was closed due to mount agung but it turned out to be a pleasant extended staycation. This time we got upgrade from business to premium room by Merta the front office guy was so helpful in keeping check on the status of airport. Breakfast is simple but very good in taste, we had cereals and egg mostly and it is already inclusive in the rate. the room is very clean and has nice entertainment in the tv itself. everyone at rhadana is so friendly and helpful. Nice small hotel with nice staff must say.

Benedictus Jodie
Group General Manager

Bed is comfy , TV channel is good. Pool is small but very nice . Wi-Fi can be better in speed but hey we are on holiday and don't care much. The road is crazy but security is the best helping is crossing to the 24 hrs mini mart.

text: I enjoyed stayed here. Clean and helpfull staff. But the room are small. Shower have good pressure and hot water works very well. Breakfast are good. Swimming pool are clean and well maintained. Good location.

text: we booked via website, the rhadana.com looks cool that drew us to book direct. upon arrival, the facade was not that attractive as we imagined but the lobby was cool with lots of old vintage ornaments. reception was fast in doing the check in, that took probably 4 minutes ( we do counting ). the staff speak english and knowledgeable , friendly. Noven the guy from cafe de dapoer was good in recommending the nasi goreng and ayam goreng, delicious !. we had breakfast once and was pretty good for the price, value for money. second day and so forth we were invited by our friends to have breakfast somewhere. all in all Rhadana has good vibes, relaxing, friendly and helpful staff with balinese smile. the only set back was the traffic, we were not comfortable but big relieve from hendrikus security guard who always help us to cross the road.
title: love the staff here

text: From ubud to raya Kuta is a big difference. The traffic here is crazy. Too many vehicles, the hotel is not bad but honestly small in size compared to our previous hotel in ubud . Breakfast has Ok options for the price. If we come back to this hotel is because of the staff and service. If we look for serenity and big room we will go to ubud area.

After hours and security service very good, friendly and helpful. We had mosquitoes in our room and were kindly given bug spray😊

text:
I selected this hotel on the basis of the reviews but was sceptical of matching results due to the low price I paid to get room booked for 3 days.
But unbelievably, it has far exceeded my expectations in all areas, may be good customer service, beautifully theme based rooms, breakfast and other amenities.
I requested for early checking, which was provided. The hotel staff and particularly Ms. Mega was wonderful. Knowing that we are vegetarian, she specially cooked pasta for us.
The pool is nice. The only lacuna was that you were required to log in several times for wifi.
Live with them and enjoy the hospitality of wonderful Bali.

text: first time and booked at 3D studio the train station room, was so impressive with the impact. we paid about usd 90 per night but worth it, not only the room was spacious but the vibes inside was like surrounded by train station that came so alive. the breakfast was inclusive and return airport transfer in the rate. our studio 3D was so clean and the staff from reception girl to security were so friendly and helpful. their customer service is excellent though

text: this is a small boutique hotel which we understood but the service is so good that we dont want to leave. check in was efficient , merta the guy at the reception was friendly and informative. breakfast was value for money as there is salad, cereal, toast, coffee / tea , milk and eggs. recommend this place for our friends who wants a clean room and friendly and helpful staff.

text:
We stayed at the Rhadana for a nearby conference and we loved the hotel. We requested and got to stay in the Bob Marley room which was awesome. Some draw backs are that it's on a very busy street that is both dangerous and hard to cross, so stay on the right side of the street and walk all the way down to the beach and restaurants (20 min). 

The pool area is great and hiring a driver allowed us to explore the city more and find some great places to eat. There was a dominos and supermarket right next door though which was nice!

Next time we will pick a hotel closer to the beach/along a quieter street.
title: Great Hotel, but Dangerous Street

text:

This is my first experience staying at Rhadana hotel. I was booked thru Booking.com and should be stay on 6-7 Oct'16 but then I need to revise it to be 7-8 Oct'16. The receptionist was fast response to give the confirmation.

Check in process was handled smooth and friendly. The staff explain all the room and hotel facilities clearly.

title: Boutique Hotel with Affordable Price

text:
We stayed three nights in this hotel and were very happy with the rooms, food and service. We were greeted warmly by staff on arrival and they were always there to help throughout the day. We stayed in one of the large studio rooms to the front of the building. The room was nicely decorated and a great size. The room was also cleaned every day that we were there. 

The hotels pool area was a nice oasis on a busy road. The breakfast was the best part of the stay. All ingredients were fresh and you could get a western continental breakfast or a traditional balinese breakfast. 

The only negative is the location. It is about a fifteen minute walk on a crazy busy road to get into kuta square. There is no path or pedestrian crossings along the walk so expect scooters whizzing by and running across the road when you can. We didn't mind this but if you are a family or wouldn't be comfortable with it then I would suggest something a little closer. Also the road outside the hotel is very busy so if you are a light sleeper get a room to the back. 

Overall a great stay with great value for money and exceptional staff. Would defo go back!
title: Value for Money!

text:
I stayed at two other hotels on my vacation and this was the last hotel I book which was for 4 nights. 

Pros:
Check in was really fast and simple. I was given a room on the 3rd floor. The rooms are very comfortable and washrooms are spacious. Really friendly staff especially the lady from housekeeping(whose name I didn't get). Good pool. Good breakfast 

I work at a hotel so I understand standards, guest complaints and how annoying it gets so I usually don't care to a certain point... 

Cons: 
I was disgusted with the customer service of the hotel... 
I ordered a tuna sandwich. It arrived to my room without a cover. Which means they've brought my food up to my room for all the neighborhood flies to have a party on. Oh yes.. A big dead fly hanging off the side of my food. 
So I called the front desk and he sent someone to my room to collect it. I then changed my order to something of the same price because now I'm paranoid thinking they'll just remove the fly and give me the same food. So I decided to then instead order calamari. 
About 20 minutes later they bring my calamari rings to my room only to find out that it was deep fried onion rings. 5 pieces of onion rings! I could've gone to the shop and bought onions myself if I wanted it.
I was so upset by this time it's already about 3pm and I went downstairs to the lobby with my food and told them I didn't want onions. I was then offered another meal. I wasn't even compensated or given a sincere apology for the disgusting service of this place. I had no reason to eat another meal there. My #1 concern is food poisoning. I will never return and I will not recommend this place to anyone. We don't know what their standards are back in the kitchen.
title: Worst experience

owner_response.text:
Dear Robyn S,

Thank you for sharing your review in the Trip Advisor. We appreciated your compliments towards our efficient check in process, friendly staff and our comfortable rooms.

We are however disheartened and disappointed to learn about your "Cons" review. We have investigated thoroughly the case and confirmed by our Chef and the F&B staff that no fly/flies in the kitchen and in your food as we have been practicing a strict hygiene food procedure backed up by the 'Hygiene certificate' issued and inspected by the Health Authority. On top of that our kitchen has been equipped with a modern fly control machine to keep the kitchen away from the flies.  Our food handling track record, since the Hotel open until today we never had a case of food poisoning. Also on the same day, our Chef cooked and the F&B staff delivered to other 15 rooms and the guests were extremely happy. As to the 'faux pas' of the Calamari to Onion rings, our F&B staff actually apologized, offered you the refund and other dish you wish to order but was understandably declined. In fact the F&B staff received a tip of Rp. 10,000 and noted that you were ok.

Once again, thank you for staying at The Rhadana and we do understand that our property may not be of everybody's cup of tea, but we continue to strive for an excellent service with a family oriented approach yet professional and last but not least to continue offering a value for money package. 

Salam hangat,

Budiman Widjaja
General Manager

선베드도 좋았음.
하지만 물속의 부유물이 많았던건 Not good..
룸도 깨끗하였으며 관리를 잘해놓았음.
침대상태는 soso...
룸이 조금해서 짐 많은 관광객은 불편할것같음.

아침조식은 매우 훌륭하였으며, 가성비 최고의 숙소.

지인들에게 추천해주고 싶은 숙소.
title: very good

text: Eigentlich gibt es nichts zu meckern. Leider war im zweiten Eindruck die Sauberkeit zu verbessern. Spinnengewebe und vergilbte und dreckige Handtücher. Ein Problem weil kuta sehr schmutzig ist. Frühstück für Asien ok. Ich hatte aber schon bessere Buffets in Asien. Personal sehr freundlich. Hotel sehr hellhörig. Würde es aber wieder buchen
title: Für eine Nacht ist es hier gut

text: Неплохой уютный отель, мини бассейн, шведский стол (завтраки), удобная порковка, не долеко от центра пешком минут 15, номера чистые, имеется сейф, холодильник, принадлежности для постояльцев. Номера необходимо обновить у нас был номер 2209, уже отваливаются обои, не совсем понятно почему при заезде дали принадлежности для ванной на одного человека, т.к номер бронировали на двоих, в целом неплохой отель для не продолжительного времени рядом с аэропортом
title: Rhadana kuta

text:
Hôtel situé à 15 minutes à pied du centre. 
Chambre petite
Mur abîmé
Douche toute petite et très peu de débit selon les périodes souvent le soir
Buffet correct mais pas top non plus
Hôtel musulman donc ne servent pas d alcool
Personnel très souriant et à l écoute
Prix correct
title: Passable

text:
Waar ook dit hotel in uitblinkt is de vriendelijkheid en behulpzaamheid van het personeel.
Verder hebben we in 7 dagen tijd in 3 kamers verbleven, de eerste had allemaal smerige vlekken op de muren en tevens hadden we in de nacht lekkage. 
In de tweede kamer werkte de airco niet, en dat is zo’n beetje het belangrijkste van je kamer.
Toen kregen we een upgrade en een grotere schonere kamer.
Helaas doen ze weinig aan onderhoud, op de foto’s welke online getoond worden is alles nog nieuw, maar in die staat is het hotel al lang niet meer. Ook zitten er vaak vlekken in schone handdoeken en zijn ze ook vaak tot op de draad versleten.
Het hotel ligt aan een drukke weg, maar als je aan het einde van de gang van het hotel zit hoor je dat niet, kamernummers eindigend op 12 en hoger zeg maar.
title: Voldoende

text: 사진에 보이는 것보단 호텔이 확실히 작습니다. 방도 작고 리뷰를 보니 바퀴가 출몰한다는 말에 높은 층을 달라고 했는데 에어컨이 노후되었는지 에어컨 소리에 제대로 잘 수가 없었습니다. 스탭은 모두 친절하고 시설도 깔끔합니다. 워낙 저렴해서 가격대비 만족도는 높았습니다. 들어가시기 전에 방 상태만 잘 확인 하시면 만족하실거같아요
title: 가성비는 좋으나 4성은 아님

text: Godt ophold. Flinkt personale, godt og rent værelse. Fin morgenmad. Dejlig pool. Hotellet ligger lidt væk fra centrum, men så undgår man også larmen. Wifi var rigtig dårligt fra vores værelse, fungerede fra poolområdet.
title: Godt ophold

text:
Chambre simple mais propre et fonctionnelle.
L’hôtel n’est pas situé dans le centre (10 minutes en scooter), mais cela ne nous a pas gêné.
Personnel accueillant et disponible.
Petit déjeuner buffet varié et bon.
title: Bon rapport qualité prix

text:
Parfait pour quand vous arrivez ou repartez , nous n'y avons dormi q'une nuit.

Chambre propre, literie ok, piscine ok , dommage ils manquent quelques chaises autour de la piscine.

Petit dejeuner compris très bien variété west and East bien situé à Kuta .
title: hotel ok et bon marché

text: El hotel es lindo y muy limpio (excepto la pileta que no tenía tan buena pinta). Pero está muy lejos de todo y a pesar de haber solicitado cama doble, tuve que insistir para que cambiaran las 2 camas individuales que había cuando llegué. El desayuno estaba bien pero no tenía demasiadas cosas. Por el mismo costo hay mejores opciones realmente.
title: Aceptable, pero sin nada que destaque

text:
Dopo 30 giorni di viaggio in Indonesia  posso dire che il Rhadana è un  "hotel"; uno dei pochi che si puo' chiamare hotel considerando la fascia di prezzo e qualità.
Camere non molto grandi, ma confortevoli e soprattutto un bagno, un vero bagno. 
Unica pecca la mancanza di un asciugamano per il viso.
Un buon ristorante che non serve bibite alcoliche, ma che possono essere consumate in camera per rispetto alla religione islamica. Personale molto educato e disponibile.
title: Finalmente un hotel

text: Nous sommes restés une nuit au Rhadana Kuta Bali dans une chambre double entre 2 vols à l'aéroport de Bali. L'endroit était pratique pour nous, pas très loin de l'aéroport, peu cher, tout en étant très confortable et calme. La chambre était belle, confortable et très propre. Le staff était sympathique. Un très bon rapport qualité prix. En revanche, l'hôtel est loin de la plage et du centre et ce n'est surement pas la meilleure option si l'on veut en profiter, à moins de prendre systématiquement des taxis.
title: Très bon rapport qualité prix et bel endroit

text:
Abbiamo prenotato questa struttura perché ci siamo fatti prendere dalle recensioni positive su Booking! Sono scioccata! Ma veramente per voi questo hotel merita 8.6? Le camere distrutte, ti danno nel “pacchetto” solo due teli doccia...e il viso? Doccia sporca e vecchia come la stanza... per non parlare del phon ragazzi!! Era uno di quelli pieghevoli e non si reggeva aperto...uno di quelli del 1800! Manco mia nonna ce l’aveva! Croce nera sul ristorante...io e mio marito una sera, presi dalla stanchezza abbiamo deciso di cenare nel ristorante dell’hotel...il giorno dopo l’abbiamo passato sul gabinetto!
Di questa permanenza non gradevole posso dare un buon voto al personale sempre gentilissimo!
title: Proprio no!

text: Zatrzymaliśmy się w hotelu na dwie nocy w sierpniu. Niestety zarówno hotel jak i jego lokalizacja były zupełnie nieadekwatne do oceny jaką hotel posiada. Jest usytuowany przy bardzo ruchliwej drodze, na wąskiej działce, gdzie oprócz strefy z basenem nie ma spokojnego miejsca do posiedzenia. Pokoje były raczej czyste, średniej wielkości.  Śniadania dość ubogie. Ogromnym plusem był natomiast bardzo miły i niesamowicie pomocny personel. Myślę jednak, że stosunek jakości do ceny- nieadekwatny.
title: Poniżej oczekiwań

text: Kuta centrumától 5perc sétára található, egy csendesebb utcában. A kiszolgálás tökéletes volt a személyzet barátságos és kedves. Mindenben segítőkészek voltak. Az udvari medence szép. Az ételek finomak a reggeli bőséges volt.
title: Rhadana Kuta 🙏🏻

text:
Персонал приветливый, отличная еда, понравился дизайн рецепции объединенной со столами ресторанчика, как то по домашнему уютно. Удобная парковка. В номере всё что нужно есть, убираются отлично, всё было идеально чисто.
Из минусов, 1. был очень шумный кондиционер 2. огромное количество маленьких муравьёв на стенах и столе, сильно раздражающие и бегающие по ноутбуку после того как он полежал на столе
title: Последний отель из нашего тура, который включал 6 отелей за 2 недели

text:
Abbiamo soggiornato in questo hotel per due giorni ed è andato tutto molto bene.
Abbiamo avuto un inconveniente la prima notte (a causa di un gruppo arrivato alle tre di notte, che ha iniziato ad urlare per i corridoi), ma non appena abbiamo chiesto di cambiare camera, il personale si è dimostrato subito cortese e pronto a soddisfare la nostra richiesta. 
Non è molto distante dalla strada principale di Kuta, anche se non si trova proprio in posizione centrale.
Non è economico, ma la colazione è molto assortita e il posto è pulito, quindi ne vale la pena. Il bagno è spazioso e dotato di un'ampia doccia. La piscina è ben curata e servono dei juice di frutta fresca particolarmente buoni! 
Lo consiglio!
title: Tanto così...alla perfezione!

text: Albergo fuori Mi ha su una strada molto trafficata a circa 15 minuti a piedi dal centro. Buona l'accoglienza. Personale gentile. Struttura pulita e camera nei limiti. Abbiamo soggiornato qui una sola notte vista la vicinanza all'aeroporto per riposare prima di partire. Assolutamente non sopportabile il caos dovuto a grida e continue voci provenienti dal corridoio iniziate alla 5.30 del mattino fino alle 8! Colazione assolutamente non sufficiente. Per occidentali praticamente solo pane tostato e marmellata.
title: Camere rumorose

owner_response.text:
Dear Crisca81,

Thank you for posting a review in the trip advisor and complemented our friendly staff and cleanliness of the room and hotel in general. We are sorry to learn that your one night stay did not meet up to your expectation. Our Chef however had a rotation of including salads, potatoes, milk, fresh coffee, fresh tea, toast bread and some other Indonesian dishes for breakfast. We wish you could have stayed longer and be able to serve you better.

Salam hangat,

Made Rahmawati
Asst. Group GM
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Ganz ehrlich, wir haben die Bewertungen gelesen, wir haben die Fotos angeschaut und dachten, ok, müsste passen. Wir haben in diesem Hotel eine Nacht übernachtet (vor der Abreise). Das Zimmer war extrem winzig, das Bad... 
Die Lage ist auch nicht besser, 30 bis 40 Min zum Strand und dann noch durch eine sehr befahrene Straße. Das Frühstück hatte die Auswahl nur für asiatische Gäste. Die Tassen rochen noch Kloake...
Unser Fazit... Nie wieder!
title: 4 Sterne??? Niemals...

text:
Trato muy agradable, atentos. Las habitación son pequeñitas pero impecables bonitas y limpias.
Es un Hotel pequeñito por lo que no está masificado, pero acogedor y familiar para estar tranquilos , es cómodo , limpio y confortable.
title: Muy familiar y limpio

text:
posizione 
staff
camere
atmosfera
cibo
drink
davvero gentilissimi molto disponibili 
ti aiutano in tutto e per tutto possibilità di pagare con carte e le camere sono pulite e confortevoli una dormita epica😂😂😂
title: ottimo hotel

text: Ottimo hotel leggermente fuori kuta, 10 minuti a piedi e si arriva alla spiaggia. punto strategico per visitare il Sud di Bali. 25 min di scooter da uluwatu, 5 da seminyak e 30 da tanah lot. Camere molto belle, confortevoli, colazione molto buona, piscina esterna e personale gentilissimo e disponibile. Se vi serve uno scooter chiedete agli uomini della sicurezza (prezzo circa 70k rupie). Consigliatissimo!
title: Ottimo appoggio!

owner_response.text:
Dear 6 giorni fa,

Thank you for sharing a positive review in the Trip Advisor. We are excited to learn all your positive complements towards our staff and rooms. 

We look forward to having you back to Rhadana again.

Salam hangat,

Made Rahmawati
Asst. Group GM
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Siamo stati al Rhadana per 12 giorni. Quando sono arrivata mi sono detta ma dove ho fissato....albergo piccolo, camere mignon senza quasi il posto x i vestiti, terrazzo in miniatura....insomma ero veramente sfiduciata .... poi invece mi sono ricreduta e do 5 stelle x i seguenti motivi:
La colazione non è molto varia ma è buonissima, 
Le camere sono piccole è vero ma pulitissime e molto confortevoli...dopo un giorno ti trovi a tuo agio e ti sembra di essere a casa?
E adesso parliamo del personale, il vero fiore all'occhiello del Rhadana, persone speciali e fantastiche, sempre pronti ad aiutarti a consigliarti. 
Io ringrazio veramente tutti dai ragazzi della sicurezza alle persone della reception è anche il cameriere che la mattina con un grande sorriso mi portava il latte caldo!!!!
Grazie a tutti.....siete una squadra fantastica!!!!
title: Piacevole sorpresa

text: Останавливались в этом отеле на неделю. Персонал отличный. В нашем номере не было окна....это было очень неудобно!!! Из-за этого не было возможности даже вещи просушить. Завтраки нормальные, но за неделю надоело. В общем если расценивать отель, только чтобы прийти и переночевать, то подойдет.
title: Номер без окна!!!!

text:
A rhadana hotel ci sono stato solo una notte come intermezzo tra Bali e le isole gili. Si tratta di un hotel ordinato,accogliente con camere non grandi ma che hanno tutte le facilities.
Bella piscina

Lo consiglio soprattutto per last minutes in alta stagione ( ho pagato 10 euro la notte).In ogni caso si tratta di un hotel affidabile e perfetto dal punto di vista qualita-prezzo
title: Bel albergo

text: Hotel limpio y personal muy agradable, las habitaciones no eran muy grandes. Esta un poco alejado de la playa, 30 min a pie y a 10 min de las orineras tiendas, cosa que lo hace muy tranquilo. Esta prohibido fumar excepto en las escaleras de acceso y en la piscina y no se sirve alcohol. El desayuno muy justo para occidentales a menos que te quieras inflar a arroz y pollo. Un poco de fruta, pan de molde con mermelada y mantequilla, zumo y cafe y te balineses.
title: No esta mal

text: Hotel molto bello ed economico, affacciato su una Delle strade principali di kuta , le stanze sono pulite e a tema , noi siamo capitati in quella della citilink ( compagnia aerea ) , colazione da migliorare perché non ci sono molte cose da poter prendere , presente anche una piscina , non molto grossa.
title: Hotel molto bello ed economico.

text:
Je recommande très fortement cet hôtel, après 3 semaine en Indonésie, ma femme et moi avons posé nos valises au Rhadana hôtel. 
Une très belle expérience, personnel au top, tres agréable, bon petit déjeuner, très propre.
Rapport qualité prix exceptionnel. 

Merci encore pour cet agréable moment .
title: " Magnifique "

text:
+ schöner Pool
+ Zimmer sehr sauber und ordentlich
+ super freundliches Personal, schnelles Checkin (auch ohne Probleme schon 1,5h vor der eigentlichen checkin Zeit möglich!)

(- Zimmer relativ klein, aber ausreichend für ein paar Tage!)
title: Top!

text:
Ein super nettes Hotel! Wer ein Luxushotel erwartet ist hier falsch, doch wenn man ein paar Tage in Kuta bleiben möchte, und von dort aus ein paar Touren macht, für den ist das das richtige :) 
Super nettes Personal und 24h Room-Service. Schöner Pool und Vorfällen abends ist es ein Traum dort baden zu gehen 👍🏻
title: Schön für paar Tage!

text:
Kleineres Hotel ca. 20 Taxi Minuten vom Flughafen Denpasar entfernt. 
Sehr sehr freundliches Personal. Schneller Check in mit einem kleinen Willkommens Getränk. 

Zimmer sind von der Größe genau richtig um erst einmal einfach auf Bali anzukommen dafür ist dieses Hotel perfekt geeignet.  

Direkt gegenüber ist ein kleiner Stand um die ersten Touren in Kuta und Umgebung buchen zu können. 

Das Frühstück ist ebenfalls vollkommen in Ordnung und ausreichend auch hier sind die Mitarbeiter sehr freundlich und schnell. 

Der Pool ist besonders Abends wenn es dunkel ist sehr schön. 

Insgesamt ist das Hotel für den Preis und die Leistung absolut zu empfehlen
title: Angenehmes Hotel

text: Molto vicino al aeroporto! Sembra un albergo nuovo , la stanza di dimensioni medie, molto carina, nuova e molto pulita. Sono rimasta solo una notte e mi sono trovata molto bene. Il personale molto carino, mi hanno trovato un driver che è stato con me per due giorni e mi ha portato ovunque avevo voglia.
title: Carino

text:
Superbe séjour dans cet hôtel, personnel au top, gérant d'une gentillesse rare et super arrangeant! toujours un membre du personnel là pour nous aider.
Bureau d'excursion juste en face de l'hôtel, super aussi à l'écoute arrangeant et présent même après avoir effectué l'excursion:-)
Je recommande à 1000% hôtel à taille humaine, ou tout le monde est serviable à l'écoute aimable et tellement souriant, vive BALI!
TRIBACASSI FOR ALL
Monica and JLO from ALGERIA
We Will Be Back We promise!
title: Magnifique

text:
Hotel con ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo, in buona posizione, fuori dal caos del centro e dalla spiaggia, comunque raggiungibile anche a piedi  in circa 20-25 minuti di camminata, e a 20-30 minuti massimo in auto dall'aeroporto.
Stanza molto piccola ma accogliente e pulita. Staff estremamente cortese. Colazione a buffet migliorabile per quanto riguarda la parte "dolce" (non abbiamo trovato ad esempio yogurt, cereali o muesli  e i croissant, considerati un extra rispetto alla colazione proposta, non erano disponibili)
title: Piacevolmente essenziale

text: Petit hôtel proche du centre ville à pied. Hôtel à taille humaine un personnel génial la chambre j'ai adore sa décorations salle de bain très bien. Le petit déjeuner simple mais bien, restaurant de l'hôtel très bien dîner 2 fois. La piscine il est vrai n'est pas une piscine olympique mais largement suffisant pour la fréquentation peu importante. Normal la mer est à 10 mn lol... seul petit bémol a souligné le remplacement des serviettes en chambre n'est pas leur fort. Mais bon on reviendra sans hésiter.
title: Génial

text:
・価格が安く比較的新しいホテルなので不安でしたが、とても清潔で明るくリゾート的な雰囲気が良いホテルで満足です。私たちは一階のフロントに近い部屋でしたが、開放感がありながらフロントとは扉で分かれていてうるさいこともなかったです。
・従業員の態度もよかったです。チェックイン前、チェックアウト後も快く荷物を預かってくれました。Wi-Fiがうまく繋がらないときも諦めずに対応してくれました。
・ホテルの外にいる駐車場係の人たちにタクシーを頼んだ際はブルーバードではなく白タクを捕まえられましたので自分たちで捕まえた方がいいと思います、、無理強いされることはなかったです。
・フロントには常にウォーターサーバーがあり、欲しい時に水が飲めます。部屋にもペットボトルが毎日置いてありました。
・私たちが泊まった時は日本人は見かけませんでした。若い人や家族連れが多かったように思います。日本語が話せる人はもちろんいなかったですが、親切なので特に問題はありませんでした。
・シャワーも熱く充分でした。エアコンもよくききます。Wi-Fiは時によって繋がりにくい時がありました。
・クタビーチまで歩いて15分、ちゃんとした両替所まで5分ぐらいです。コンビニはすぐ近くにあります。クタのメインストリートは安い店が多いですが客引きが多い。ホテルと同じ通りを北へ少し歩くとあるレストランは安くて美味しかったです。そのすぐ近くにあるマッサージも良いらしいです。
・フロントにツアーなどがあるか聞くと、ホテルの向かいに旅行代理店があるからそこで聞くようにと言われました。クタ周辺にはそういった代理店がたくさんあり、交通機関もないので車をチャーターするためには交渉することになります。色々なところで価格を見た結果ホテル前が便利だったので勧められた代理店で、車をチャーターしました。定かでないですが大体1日5000円程だったと思います。粘って値切りました。最終的に３日間お世話になりました。ドライバーさんは毎日同じで見た目は少し強面で無口でしたが、親切で毎日遅くまで行きたいところに連れていってくれて、とても感謝しています。
title: 清潔で雰囲気もよい

text: Ficamos 2 dias neste hotel. Ficamos muito contentes com o pessoal que é muito simpático. A comida é ótima, a localização também. Está a 20 minutos a pé do kuta square, do waterboom e de kuta beach. Os quartos são pequenos, mas aconchegantes. Muito confortável. Está sempre tudo muito limpo. A água da piscina é morna. A decoração é muito bonita. A única coisa que não gostamos muito foi a falta de porta de ligação entre 2 quartos: Reservamos 2 quartos, um para nós e o outro para os nossos filhos.
title: Excelente

text:
周りには観光客が行く飲食店があまりないので、歩くのが苦にならない人か、タクシーを使うのにためらいがない人向け。
南に徒歩5分でスーパーマーケットがあります。
ホテルが提供している写真はまるで高級リゾートのようですが、値段からもわかるように高級ホテルではありません。しかし、この値段でこのクオリティは素晴らしい。
リーズナブルなのに、部屋の快適さ、従業員の応対にとても満足。ビュッフェ形式の朝食はおいしく、エアコンもよく効く。次に訪れたときにもぜひ利用したいホテル。
title: おすすめ

text:
무슬림호텔이라 술은 안팔고 있습니다

위치 좋고 안전하기 때문에 동남아 여행시 안전을 

우선시 하고 가격대비 호텔을 생각하신다면

추천합니다
title: 안전하고 좋은 로케이션

text:
Hotel a mio parere molto bello, nuovo e pulito!!!!
Una bella reception belle camere un po piccole ma pulite e nuove.
Non si trova proprio in centro, dovrete camminare 15 min per  raggiungere la via principale!!!
Però lo consiglio vivamente! !!!
title: Bello bello!!!

text:
Ich habe bereits sechs Wochen in Ubud verbracht und wollte meine letzten zwei Nächte in Kuta verbringen. Aufgrund der Bewertungen habe ich mich für dieses Hotel entschieden. 
+ Mein Zimmer war zwar recht klein, aber gemütlich und sauber. Da ich alleine gereist bin, war das für mich absolut in Ordnung. 
+ Der Service ist top! Super freundlich und hilfstbereit. 
+ Das Essen im hauseigenen Restaurant war gut und günstig
+ Für mich genügend Auswahl am Frühstücksbuffet
+ Toller Pool. Zwar befinden sich nicht wirklich viele Liegen dort, aber zu meiner Zeit war immer einer frei. Abends (gegen 20 Uhr) konnte ich sogar mal alleine dort den Sternenhimmel betrachten
+ Unterstützung bei dem Flughafen-Transfer und kostenlose Gepäckaufbewahrung sogar für 9 Stunden (Check-Out um 12 Uhr, Abreise zum Flughafen 21 Uhr)

- Direkt an der Hauptstraße. Viel Verkehr, aber der wird vom Hotel-Service gestoppt, wenn man die Straße überqueren möchte
- Zimmer sehr hellhörig
title: Schöne zwei Nächte

photos.caption: Abends. Blick auf das Hotel vom Pool aus

text: Abbiamo soggiornato due notti in questo hotel e per il prezzo molto basso non ci aspettavamo un gran chè e invece ci siamo dovuti ricredere. Personale molto disponibile (ma è una caratteristica dei Balinesi) camera non molto grande  ma pulita, la colazione varia e buona. Ci è stato chiesto educatamente se fosse possibile non consumare alcolici nei locali comuni ma per noi non è stato assolutamente un problema. Non abbiamo usufruito della piscina che comunque non ci è sembrata così bella come decantato da alcuni nelle recensioni. Sicuramente se dovessi tornare a Bali non avrei dubbi a prenotare nuovamente.
title: Una sorpresa!!

text: スタッフはフレンドリーで親切、部屋は清潔でシャワーも十分な水量と温度、エアコンもよく効く。無料の水の提供まであり、何も問題はありません。大きな通りに面しているので、タクシーはつかまえやすいかと思いましたが、ピックアップポイントではないらしく、いざつかまえようとすると空車はなかなか通らないので、ホテルに頼んだ方がいいかもしれません。徒歩圏内にスーパーや飲食店や両替商もあり、便利です。ただし両替商は中心部（ビーチ周辺）の方がレートはいいです。次回クタに来ることがあれば、またここに泊まります。
title: 快適

text: Останавливались в этом отеле на 4 ночи. Полностью остались довольны выбором. Небольшой, но уютный номер со всем необходимым. Только вот сушилки для вещей не хватало. А так номер продуман полностью. Месторасположение хорошее, особенно если у вас есть свой транспорт, вкусные завтраки, и хороший бассейн, Рекомендую
title: Хорошее местечко!

text:
전체적으로 무난했으나 왜 트립어드바이저 상위 랭킹인지는 이해안갔음.
꾸따지역 가성비 높은 호텔이라선지는 모르겠지만 평범했음. 
특이점은 무슬림 호텔로 술을 팔지고 공공장소에서 마셔도 안된다는 점이며 어미니티는 2일에 하루꼴로만 채워줌.. 
근처 골목이 매우 혼잡해서 찾아올때 우버가 30분 넘게 걸린적도 있었음.
title: 무슬림 호텔로 술을 안팜

text: Grand hôtel agréable et plutôt propre. Les chambres ne sont pas grandes mais bien agencées (le ménage est assez superficiel mais correct). Les employés sont très gentils et compétents. La piscine est agréable mais pas beaucoup de place autour. Le restaurant de l'hôtel est un bon rapport qualité/prix. Nous n'avons pas testé les petits déjeuners, qui nous semblait chers (supérettes juste en face). Le point négatif est la situation de l'hôtel. Il n'y a pas vraiment de restaurant aux alentours et il est situé loin du centre ville et de la plage de Kuta - petite demi-heure à pied). C'est un hôtel avec une clientèle plutôt jeune.
title: Bien mais excentré

text: 房间很干净，客房服务准备的很贴心，地理位置很好，步行大概20分钟就可以走到海边，还会路过各种餐馆和spa。早餐也还可以，这么便宜的房间已经不能再要求更多啦，很棒，有机会的还会再去住的。
title: 性价比超高

text: Zimmer war klein aber sauber. Jeden Tag service. Das Frühstück war großteils auf die chinesischen Gäste abgestimmt. Es gab aber auch Croissants, toast und eine Marmelade. Der Saft war eher künstlich. Der Pool hat am Nachmittag leider keine Sonne. Das Fitness Center besteht aus einem Stepper und einem Laufband. Zu dem günstigen Angebotspreis auf booking okay, teurer aber nicht. Man darf kein echtes vier Sterne hotel erwarten.
title: Durchschnitt aber keine 4 Sterne

text: We hebben hier een nachtje geslapen na onze vlucht naar Bali. Was een prima hotel! Van de omgeving hebben we op dat moment weinig gezien maar het personeel is vriendelijk en de kamer ziet er goed uit.
title: Prima hotel

text:
とても清潔で綺麗なホテルでした。ホテルのスタッフも親切でした。クタビーチまで徒歩で行けないと口コミでは拝見しておりましたが、全然歩いて行けました！
ホテル周辺は新しく出来た大きなスーパーやコンビニも沢山あって、便利でした！
title: 綺麗なホテルでした

text:
Elegimos este hotel porque figuraba nùmero 1 en el ranking de hoteles en Kuta, pero la verdad es que nos decepcionò: 
La zona en la que queda es fea, es necesario alquilar una moto para moverse.
Las habitaciones son extremadamente diminutas...
Estaba lleno de chinos.... 

El desayuno es normal
Si se destaca su personal muy amable
title: Esperaba algo mejor, me decepcionò

text:
Wir waren drei Nächte dort. Das Hotel ist ok, mehr aber nicht. 

Pluspunkte: Sauberkeit, Preis, Unkompliziertheit Checkin und -out und freundliches Personal 

Minuspunkte: kleine Doppelzimmer mit wenig Ablagefläche; sehr kleines Bad, in dem es nach Abfluss stinkt und der Abzug nicht richtig funktioniert; sehr hellhörig innerhalb des Hotels und auch hinsichtlich Hauptstraße; 20 Minuten Fußmarsch ins Zentrum, 30 Minuten an den Strand entlang einer extrem befahrenen und durch Müll und Abgase stinkenden Straße; Frühstückssäfte nicht frisch sondern gezuckert (aus Pulver?), Auswahl ok, aber nicht übermäßig
title: Zimmer ok

text: 深夜のチェックインにもかかわらず部屋まで案内してくれて無料のボトル水、冷蔵庫、ルームサービスとタオルの数まで確認してくれた。ハウスキーピングがしっかりしている。pokemon Goのポストがホテルの前にあり、ホテル内のカフェから操作できる。ポケモンはいない。泊った部屋のコンセプトは機長の部屋でした。
title: 清潔

text:
Hôtel moderne avec chambre tout confort. Le personnel est accueillant et agréable. Le petit déjeuner est continental et indonésien. Très bon et change tous les jours. Fruits frais et jus de fruits frais.

Un gardien à l'entrée vous aide à traversé le trafic très encombré. L'hôtel est à 20 min de la plage à pied.
title: Bel hôtel, très bon standing

text:
Lorsque que j'ai réservé ma chambre pour clôturer mon séjour , je pensais reserver le top le numéro 1 de kuta comme précisé sur le site.....
Bonjour la déception, prix pas du tout attractif. Chambre de petite taille..... pareil pour le jacuzzi, euh pardon piscine. 
Rien d'exceptionnel,..... heureusement on reste seulement une nuit.
title: Bonjour la déception....

text:
Buena relacion calidad-precio.
Habitaciones comodas y limpias, pero sorprende que solo pongan un cepillo, unas zapatillas... cuando es una habitacion doble ¿ uno se pone la zapatillas, el otro se lava los dientes? nos ha pasado en otros hoteles tambien.
title: Buen hotel

text:
18 nachten in dit hotel geweest. Uitstekende kamers die netjes onderhouden worden. Badkamer zeer goed en zeer schoon met ruime inloopdouche. Ontbijt is goed te noemen, van ruim Aziatisch tot Europees. De menukaart     is ook ruim en het eten is zeer goed en niet duur. Zwembad is ook leuk en schoon. Personeel meer dan vriendelijk. Alle 5 een handdoekje cadeau gekregen met onze initialen erop. 
Hotel ligt aan drukke straat en 20 min. lopen naar het strand. Taxi kan ook en kost ca 2 euro naar het strand.
Dit hotel mag zeker een aanrader genoemd worden.
title: Gewoon erg goed.

text:
Dit hotel is prima om even te slapen. Maar is erg gehorig, je hoort iedereen lopen en praten op de gang. Wc/badkamer stinkt heel erg. Vieze put lucht.
Langs een hele drukke weg. 
Kamer zelf was prima. We sliepen in de Bob Marley kamer, was wel grappig.
Ontbijt was ok prima te doen.
Heel aardig personeel. 

Ik zou er zelf niet zo snel meer willen slapen.
title: Was ok

text: Bestilte værelse med morgenmad i 4 overnatninger. Pris 741kr. Hotellet er rent og med meget smilende hjælpsomt personale. Vagter udenfor hotel som sørger fot taxi og får hjælp til at komme på anden side af vejen. Morgenmad ok. Værelser(surfværelse) med at det der skal være. Ligger ca 15 min gåtid fra bemocorner. Vil nok vælge et hotel tættere på kuta by næste gang, men Rhadana er super til prisen.
title: Super godt hotel

text:
El personal es muy amable, desde las personas q están en los estacionamientos que te ayudan a cruzar la calle y siempre te sonríen.
La piscina es muy bonita, cómoda y agradable siempre existe algún lugar con sombra para refugiarse cuando hay demasiado sol.
Sólo tuvimos dos problemas, en la primera habitación una del segundo piso el a/c era algo ruidoso y botaba mucha agua que mojo nuestra ropa y el WiFi no funcionaba.  Arreglaron el a/c pero volvió a fallar y el WiFi jamás tuvo solución, por lo que solicitamos el cambio de pieza
 Finalmente en el tercer piso no tuvimos ningún problema, aunque el wifi no funcionaba después de las 11pm al interior de la habitación, lamentablemente nunca lavaron nuestra ropa que quedó con olor a humedad, el encargado quedó de llamarnos y jamás lo hizo. 
El desayuno es para occidental  occidentales , tostadas de pan de molde, mantequilla, mermelada, queso, te, café, frutas, huevo.
title: Tranquilo y agradable

text:
はじめてのバリで、こちらに3泊しました。
館内はどこも清潔です。
朝のバイキングも美味しくて、毎日違う物が出てくるので飽きません。
雰囲気も落ち着けていいです。
プールにはバスタオルが置いてあり、いつでものんびり利用できます。
スタッフもとてもフレンドリーでした。
title: 快適でした。

text: Le studio est assez spacieux et agréable. La salle de bain est bien. La piscine extérieure est fort agréable lorsque l'on ne veut pas affronté le nombre de touriste à l'extérieur. Le petit déjeuner sous forme de buffet est normal sans rien d'extraordinaire.
title: Hôtel agréable

text: Le lobby/restaurant de cet hôtel est magnifique.  Décor charmant.  Les chambres sont petites mais très fonctionnelles.   Elles sont très propres et très confortables.  La piscine est agréable.  Le personnel est accueillant et avenant.   Tranquille.  Vraiment parfait, surtout à ce prix.
title: Parfait pour le budget

text: Мы изначально искали недорогой отель с хорошими отзывами , и не ошиблись в выборе. Номера , конечно , небольшие, но чистые и есть все необходимое. Есть уютный бассейн на территории отеля , работает до 21-00, там можно поплавать вечером  и просто посидеть компанией , если не хочется идти куда-то. Минус отеля в том , что рядом очень мало ресторанов , в шаговой доступности только продуктовый магазин (и это плюс скорее ) и KFC. Поэтому тем , кто без мотобайка будет неудобно, да кстати с парковкой у отеля нет проблем. Завтраки однообразные , но вкусные. И еще хочу добавить , в отеле очень дружелюбный персонал !
title: хороший отель с приветливым персоналом

text: In diesem Hotel stimmte einfach vom check-in bis zum Transport zum Flughafen alles. Begrüßungsdrink zu Beginn und ein herzlicher Empfang mit Tips wo man was findet. Frühstück am ersten morgen noch a là carte danach Buffet,  wobei uns das a là carte lieber war. Ruhiger und großer Pool. Einzig im Fitnessraum könnte nachgebessert werden. Gerne wieder.
title: Super Service

text: мы отдыхали на Бали в июне 2015 года. Отель чистый, насекомых никаких не встретите) номера небольшие , но  удобные , в номере есть сейф (для тех кто боится оставлять вещи без присмотра), небольшой холодильник , чайник ; уборка ежедневно , мыльные принадлежности обновляют регулярно, чай, кофе и сахар тоже. На территории отеля есть бассейн , народу там очень мало бывает, т.к. в основном все где-то пропадают в течение дня) Есть парковка для скутеров , обслуживающий персонал всегда помогут подъехать к отелю, если плотное движение и повернуть будет сложно) Также помогут  заказать такси самое недорогое на острове. Вообще весь персонал очень приветливый и отзывчивый! Завтрак однообразный , но вкусный ! WI-FI прекрасно работал ! однозначно хороший вариант для бюджетного отдыха , но и для тех, кто хочет получить хороший сервис!
title: Прекрасный  бюджетный отель

text: Husk at informere om hvis du ikke vil have rygerværelse.. vi bookede via hotel.com som skrev at det var et værelse med udsigt over byen og ikke ryger værelse.. vi fik et rygerværelse uden udsigt.. efter første nat med støj henvendte vi os i receptionen og de var meget hjælpsomme med at få ændret værelset til et med balkon og ikke ryger værelse..En stor tak til Merta for hjælpen håber hotel.com får styr på tingene
title: Der er mange rygerværelser

text:
В сентябре 2014 с мужем летали отмечать годовщину в Индонезию ( о.Бали) . 
Ездили впервые, поэтому хотели больше поездить по острову и побольше посмотреть . 
Выбор пал на The Rhadana Hotel (kuta). 

Отель не большой 4 этажа. 
Номер достаточно чистый и уютный . 
Очень приветливый и отзывчивый  персонал. 

Не было не единого нарекания . 
Находится в километре от пляжа КУТЫ.
Рядом хороший большой супермаркет , где очень большой выбор.
нет надоедливых торговцев. 
очень хороший СПА в 5 минутах ходьбы . И намного бюджетней чем рядом с пляжем.  

Очень рекомендуем тем кто собирается  на Бали впервые.
title: Отличный бюджетный отель

text: Hôtel récent situé à 15/20 minutes à pied du centre ville. Le personnel est très souriant et réactif, le petit déjeuner est plus que raisonnable et la piscine est propre et agréable. La décoration de l'hôtel est vraiment sympa et on s'y sent comme chez soit. Le seul bémol est la luminosité dans la chambre au réveil, les stores laissent trop passer la lumière du jour.
title: Hôtel impeccable

text:
Wir waren nach unserer Bali-Ankunft und vor unserer Bali-Abreise jeweils 2-3 Nächte da. Der Patron hat sich sehr gefreut, als wir wieder gekommen sind und uns viel erzählt. 
Das Frühstücksbuffet ist sehr ausgiebig und man kann soviel essen wie man möchte. Die Zimmer werden sehr sauber gehalten, sind eher ein bisschen klein aber man ist ja sowieso nur zum Schlafen da. Das Personal ist wieder sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend.
Die Lage ist leider nicht ganz so zentral und bis zum Strand muss man einen 15-20min Fussmarsch auf sich nehmen aber die Taxis sind ja so günstig, dass man sich auch einfach diese leisten kann.
title: Das sauberste Hotel in dem wir auf unserer 4 Wochen-Reise waren!

text: Alt i alt veldig fornøyd med hotellet, veldig koselige og hyggelige ansatte!! Veldig rolig plass, ikke overfylt! Var litt unna sentrum men betale aldri mer enn 30000idr for taxi og bestilte alltid bluebird! Frokosten var ok, jeg savnet egg! Ellers skulle jeg virkelig ønske di hadde en meny med utvalg av vegetarmat!
title: Rolig hotell

text: Wir waren zweimal im Rhadana und beides mal haben wir uns rund um gut umsorgt gefühlt. Es gab direkt ein welcome Drink und auf unsere Wünsche wurde eingegangen. Wir haben am abreise Tag sogar ohne Aufpreis länger im Zimmer bleiben können. Beim Frühstück gab es leider kein Buffet aber wir konnten so oft wie wir wollten nach bestellen was auch nicht schlecht ist! Der Pool ist groß und lädt zum entspannen ein. Es ist relativ zentral sind in 15 Minuten auf der Legian zu Fuß gewesen. Wir kommen gerne wieder!!!
title: Super Personal und Pool

text: shattle per l aereoporto in arrivo,grande accoglienza alla reception albergho piccolo ma strategico .pensano a tutto  loro per il motorino e quant altro.stanze nuove pulite e accoglienti ma un po piccole come metraggio,comunque nel contesto tutto in ordine e al posto giusto.ci ritornero volentieri.
title: albergo nuovissimo carino e accogliente
